Title: Great 4 1/2 plateau
Description:
(English will follow)

Cession de bail d'un charmant petit 4 et demi (cuisine et salle à manger reliée ainsi que grande pièce double pouvant être séparée par des rideaux pour faire une chambre et un salon ou bureau) situé à 45 secondes à pieds du Parc Laurier, à louer pour décembre 2017. Idéal pour personne seule ou pour un couple.

L'appartement est au premier étage avec une jolie cour arrière privée. Plancher de bois franc, hauts plafonds (9 pieds 1/2) et bain sur pattes !

Le logement est situé sur la rue Chambord, dans un des quartiers les plus agréables de Montréal (Petit Laurier) et est à proximité de tous les services (Épicerie à 20 secondes à pieds ; SAQ, guichet Desjardins, pharmacie, boulangerie, restaurants et cafés tous à moins de 2 minutes à pieds !!). 

L'appartement est semi-meublé (frigo, poêle). Il y a une entrée pour laveuse mais pas de sortie pour sécheuse (il y un landromat au coin de la rue)

830$, sans les charges (hydro + gaz-métro).

Références demandées par le propriétaire

Faites-vite :) 


---

Lease to transfer, for december 1st : small and charming 4 and half (two doublerooms : bedroom + livingroom/office and kitchen + dining room), located near the beautiful Parc Laurier. Perfect for one person or for a couple.

The apartment is on the lower storey, with acces to a cute private yard. Hard wooden floors, big bathtub and 9 1/2 feet ceilings !

On Chambord Street (Petit Laurier) you'll find everything you need : Grocerie store (Metro), SAQ, Desjardins, Jean-Coutu, bakery, coffee shops and many more assets !

Oven and fridge furnished.

830$ without the charges (hydro, gaz-metro)

Write to us for an apointment !

Title: 7I7AIDE All included doesn't exist!!! ("Huge" Condo)
Description:
7I7AIDE 104EN

- Beautiful and modern 4-plex -- only 3 neighbours 
- Well insulated thermally and acoustically 
- 1160 sf. 
- Recent building (2008) , condos renovated in 2015-2016 
- Huge terazza 100sf (~ 9x12ft ), BBQ possible 
- Residential area minutes from Downtown 
- Big beds in massive wood 
- French Provincial / Victorian/Modern solid wood bedrooms, exquisite furniture 
- 2 complete bathrooms 
- Jacuzzi style tub AND shower in main bathroom and large shower in the otherone 
- 3bdr , queen beds and huge livingroom (can take a 4th student/roommate) 
- 3 km from Loyola Concordia and 4 from the Guy Concordia, - - Concordia suttle passing by. 
- 8min walking to Vandome metro station (or 3 min by bus) 
- 8 min from the Glen Megahospital 
- Park at 100m, 3 utility store in 100m, 3 supermarkets in 400m, 1 km and 1.2 km 
- Ceramic stainless steel stove. 
- Stainless steel fridge and dishwasher 
- Frontal washer dryer in your condo (not in the basement) 

-------------------------------------------- 
Of course you like it 
Does your second choice have all those features? 
My next question is why would you expect to get it at the same price as the one you DON'T like ? 
And second question: would you supplement a bit your initial budget to get something that you like? (could be just 3$ a day)... 
--------------------------------------------- 
Conditions apply 
The main price is nothing included. 
We are open to rent to families, sudents or roomates.
In case of students: Student rental (and not only!) implies different needs that we are all aware: completely furnished or services/utilities included or flexible lease or...all of the above. We are ready and capable to comply with those needs. . . but again, my question is. . . why would you expect all this to be "included" (which in your sub-conscious means "for free")?! 
If you need any added value (furnishing, flexible/shorter lease and some or all services included), it will be done for a price corresponding to the extra effort in administration and costs (and nobody will do it for free- just might make you believe that). 

I am in the market for several years, pls allow me to explain you the myth of "all included": If there are 2 condos of equal price and one owner "offers" the services /utilities included while the other one (greedier- you might think) charge them as extra, the reality is that the first condo/apartment has a lower REGULAR RENTING VALUE -RRV . That would be the condo's renting value empty (unfurnished) and long (aka regular) term -- 1 year (renewable). 
The RRV depends on the quality of the building (thermal and acoustic isolation, etc), age (that might be in connection with the just enumerated factors), location (ex how far from Downtown and what amenities are available around). 
Services/utilities could be presented as "included" but they are not at all free, simply because they are not a un-noticeable value as most people (students especially) think, but 200-700$/month depending on the condo and on the season. A low "all included" rent means that the RRV is even lower , do not think that the owner didn't add some extra cost for furnishing, flexible term and utilities, simply he presented the total as THE MAGIC "all included"!!! And this total is lower because the value of the condo (RRV) is lower. 
Again, what you looking for doesn't exist, services/utilities are 200-700$ a month, nobody would give up this sum to just see a rewarding smile on some students faces. 
So, my condos ARE NOT an average student rental, this ad is addressing to students that would pay a bit more for an exquisite location (4km from Downtown -- Montreal is 50km wide), for above average appliances and , if furnished, for quite exquisite, non-student-type furniture. 
As the quality is over average, I'd hope also for the attention of postgraduates and teachers. 
Thank you for your interest. 
*** Actually this price (1499) is not really for the empty condo, it still includes [over the average quality] appliances as you can see above. "Empty " condos/apartments from CMHC statistics might be with or without appliances but when those appliances are present, in 90% of cases they are only two (2): a white (and maybe old) modest fridge and a white (and maybe old) modest stove. 
My case, again, 5 stainels steel and/or frontal appliances. 

This condo has 3 rooms for 3 students/roommates but can host a group of up to 5-6 or a big family Pls call for more info and visits -  i don't read my emails so often. 
51four 66zero 312two (if no answer, asnwer the ad, thanks).

Title: Artist Loft w/ Amazing View and Perfect Location $1650 All Included
Description:
This loft is located right in the heart of the plateau, minutes from
the metro, jazz fest, restaurants, the mountain, etc.. - literally in
the heart! This 1150 sq. foot loft boasts the artist's interior design
work which include an interior deck, Victorian style street lamp, herb
garden, acoustic sound panels, a railway tie shelving sculpture, HD
state of the art movie projector, and a 10' x 5' floating green wall.
The plant wall glides on tracks in order to allow space for movie
projections. Because there is a plant wall, the air is fresh, however
this also means that you will be responsible for watering, though this
is an easy task since I have rigged up a hose system that makes for a
5 minute watering job once a week. It has arguably the best view of the city from
the famous artist loft Berman building where many famous artists work,
directly facing west towards the mountain where you can see the
Mont Royal cross as well as the angel peering out from the tree tops
of Jeanne Meance park. The interior deck leads through giant 8ft
windows that stretch the length of the entire west wall to a large
balcony/fire escape. Sunlight blasts through the windows, illuminating
even the most dismal of days. Everything is included - Heat,
electricity, high speed internet, HD movie projector, dishwasher,
washing machine, complete kitchen, and furniture. It's a great place
to be creative (write a book, choreograph a dance, or just slump
around in the sunlight.and spend a winter without getting depressed
from a lack of light) 

1650$ / month all included. This is a sub-let
starting October 15th until June 1st/2018. Ideal for a professional. references a must.

Title: 4 1/2 + appliances - 1086 sq.ft. for rent close to Sherbrooke metro
Description:
Hello! We have an excellent 4 and a half condo for rent at 3770 Av. Coloniale #204, in the heart of the Plateau. This very large condo was entirely renovated in 2013. Available for end of October.This very large 4 and a half boasts a gorgeous open-concept design throughout the living room, kitchen, and dining area. Easily go from hosting large gatherings to unwinding solo with the large surface area at your disposal. Included with the rental: washer, dryer, refrigerator, dishwasher, stove, microwave, and wall-mounted air conditioning. The master bedroom is very large and comes equipped with a street-facing Juliet-style balcony and a double closet. In the bathroom, you will find a separate shower and bathtub. Ceramic flooring. The dining area leads to the veranda at the back, where you can put a barbecue and small table with chairs. 
The central island in the kitchen can seat over 4 people and features a sturdy granite countertop. The kitchen includes plenty of storage and counter space.Wall-mounted air conditioning in the living room. Beautiful hardwood floors throughout the condo. The unit is located in the heart of the Plateau. You will be two blocks away from Saint-Laurent boulevard with its many shops and services. You will also find nearby: hospitals, grocery stores, schools, bike paths, metro stations (Sherbrooke station is closest), cafés, museums, restaurants, and much more.  Available as of end October. 2nd floor. Elevator in building.Make this wonderful condo yours by booking your visit today!



Lease minimum 12 months. For residential use only. Non-smoking unit.


















  
Med Khouya, Re/Max du Cartier

Title: Amazing apartment in Westmount, building has true Westmount charm!!
Description:
Westmount Place Apartments is a luxury apartment building located in the heart of the prestigious Westmount neighborhood. It is just mere minutes away from the downtown core, which makes this an ideal place to live. And since it is outside of the main downtown area, you can enjoy a more peaceful atmosphere compared to the hustle and bustle of the inner city.
Renters have easy access by foot or public transportation (Vendome & Atwater Metro; multiple bus routes) to Montreal's amazing shopping district on Saint-Catherine Street, as well as to the "underground city" which is full of unique boutiques. And of course, Westmount is home to some of the newest and trendiest restaurants, shops & bars. Also, living in Westmount gives a resident close access to numerous schools ranging from daycares, elementary schools and Montreal's most renowned Universities, like McGill & Concordia. 
The city of Westmount offers up its own share of amenities - like the famous Westmount Park and the city's Recreation Center, where there are tons of activities organized for residents on a regular basis at both locations. 
BUILDING AMENITIES:
* All units include fridge, stove, hot water and wood floors
* The building includes - 24 Hour doorman service, on-site stores, rooftop terrace, concierge services, surveillance cameras, package services, laundry machines in the building, and is wheelchair accessible
* Most units come with a balcony - please inquire
* Some units come with a dishwasher - please inquire
* Located in the prestigious Westmount neighborhood
* Close to Concordia & McGill, Westmount Park, Westmount Recreation Center, Montreal Children's Hospital and the Montreal Super Hospital, Trendy Restaurants, Fashion Boutiques
* Metro access to Vendome and Atwater
* Pet friendly (Cats & Dogs)
* Indoor Garage and Outdoor Parking available (OPTIONAL)
* Storage Lockers available (OPTIONAL) 
* Bicycle Storage available (OPTIONAL)
Bus Routes: 63 and 90

Metro Stations: Vendome, Lionel Groulx, Atwater

Highway: Autoroute Ville-Marie (720)

Nearby: Westmount Garderie (daycare), Westmount Park Elementary School,
Westmount High School, Hillside Family Medicine Centre (medical clinic),
Westmount Public Library, Parc Westmount, Cinéma Cineplex Forum and many
shops and restaurants (10 min bus ride)

Public Transit: includes Bus Routes 63 and 90, closest Metro/Subway Stations are
Vendome (Orange Line), Lionel Groulx (Orange/Green Line) and Atwater (Green
Line). Close to Highway Ville-Marie (Autoroute 720, which is a branch of
Autoroute 20 which leads into downtown Montreal).

Attractions: Families with young, and school aged, children very much appreciate
how close this location is to Westmount Garderie (daycare), Westmount Park
Elementary School, and Westmount High School, and École internationale de
Montréal ( a French language Elementary and High School). Also close by is a
Medical Clinic (the Hillside Family Medicine Centre). In the area residents have
access to the new site of the McGill University Health Centre MUHC (Glen Site)
Known locally as the Montreal Super Hospital; it merged the Montreal Children's
Hospital with the Royal Victoria Hospital, and other care facilities). Residents can
make good use of the local Library (Westmount Public Library) and the local Park
(Parc Westmount). There are many shops and restaurants within a 10 min bus
ride including lots of entertainment options including a large movie theatre
(Cinéma Cineplex Forum).

Title: Bright modern 2BR 2Ba condo with parking, near metro
Description:
Impeccable semi-furnished condo for rent located at the 2nd floor of a building built in 2012, a few minutes from Lasalle metro station on the green line. Available for a long term rental, this condo for rent will charm you with its brightness, its contemporary look and many assets including its reserved parking, its quartz kitchen counters, its spacious walk-in or heated floors in polished concrete. With two enclosed bedrooms, an office space, two full bathrooms, a large open plan kitchen, living room and dining area, this semi-furnished condo of over 1050 sq ft (97m2) is perfect for a couple or a small family. Within walking distance of the subway stations, Wellington Promenade and all the vibrancy of Verdun and the Southwest, numerous parks and all shops and services. Close to downtown, Nuns' Island, St. Lawrence River, Lachine Canal, Atwater Market, bike paths and expressways. A 2 bedroom condo for rent in Verdun, just minutes from downtown Montreal, which ensures comfort and proximity.

//

Lumineux condo de 1050 pi2, situé au 2e niveau d'un petit immeuble construit en 2012, avec 2 chambres fermées de bonnes dimensions, avec amplement de rangement dont un placard d'entrée et un walk-in dans la chambre principale, avec 2 salles de bain complètes dont l'une attenante à la chambre des maîtres, et avec une vaste pièce aire ouverte pour la cuisine, le salon et la salle à manger. Comptoirs de quartz, électroménagers en inox (dont lave-vaisselle), climatiseur mural, planchers de béton radiants, plafonds hauts, grand balcon et grandes fenêtres - un condo idéal pour un couple de professionnels ou une petite famille. 

- de 5 minutes de la station de métro Lasalle 
- de 5 minutes de la dynamique rue Wellington 
- de 15 minutes du centre-ville de Montréal 
Stationnement extérieur inclus. Planchers chauffants de béton poli. Insonorisation. 2 salles de bain complètes. 2 chambres fermées + coin bureau. Électros inox. Comptoirs de quartz. Plafonds hauts. Walk-in. Balcon-terrasse de bonnes dimensions. Climatisation.

À distance de marche des stations de métro, de la Promenade Wellington et de tout le dynamisme de Verdun et du Sud-Ouest, de nombreux parcs et de tous les commerces et services. À proximité du centre-ville, de l'Île des Soeurs, du Fleuve St-Laurent, du Canal Lachine, du Marché Atwater, des pistes cyclables et des voies rapides. Un condo à Verdun, à quelques minutes du centre-ville de Montréal, qui vous assure confort et proximité. 

1900$/mois - dispo. (Semi-Meublé, stationnement)
Pour infos et visites -- écrivez-nous!

Title: ***Stunning Spacious Corner Unit Loft***Quartiers des Spectacles***
Description:
Absolutely beautiful, sunny and spacious one-bedroom corner-unit at the luxurious Lofts des Arts. Perfect location in the vibrant Quartiers des Spectacles, steps from St. Laurent metro, UQAM, Place des Arts, endless restaurants, cafés, shops and a short walk from McGill campus. No pets, no smokers, lease until June 30, 2018 with option to renew. Credit check, refernces required. Easy to visit!

Title: Large 3 1/2 near Concordia Loyola Campus, perfect for students (2018)
Description:
Summary (Available Jan 2018-May 2018):

Bright and cozy fully furnished apartment in quiet and friendly NDG neighborhood of Montreal, perfect for both students and holiday-goers! Located just under a 10-minute walk to Concordia University Loyola campus. Convenient 10-minute walk away from large mall with McDonald's, Pharmacy, Grocery store, and bank. Bus stop right in front of building with just a 15- minute ride to get to Metro. If coming by car, plenty of free parking available on street. Quick 10 minutes drive to reach main highway.

Our Space:
We are renting out our place for a period of approximately 5 months since we will be away (Starting January 2018 and ending around May 2018). We are searching for a long term rental (Concordia Students attending a Winter Semester, workers, or long term travelers). We normally live here so it is a fully furnished apartment with all the amenities you would require. Just bring your luggage and you are set! :) The apartment is located on the 7th floor of a large apartment complex with private key access and beautiful view. Two elevators available.

Kitchen includes: Oven, stove, fridge, freezer, microwave, coffee maker, slow cooker, rice cooker, plates, cutlery, an assortment of spices. Pretty much anything you need for cooking!

Living Room: 50inch TV, PlayStation 3 with free access to Netflix, large dining room table that can seat 5-6 people, leather couch, work desk with desktop computer and printer. High-speed WIFI and internet.

Entertainment: TV, PlayStation 3, and a large collection of Board Games. Bedroom: Queen sized very comfortable bed, 2 large and 1 small dresser, 2 large closets, access to balcony.

Storage space: 2 large closets in living room. We have our stuff in there now but if you need the space, we will empty it.

Laundry: Washing/Dryers machines available downstairs.

Parking: Free and easily found near the building. You are welcome to use our laundry detergent, soap, shampoo, spices etc...

If you have any questions, please contact me at 
 
 (cell)
Je parle français aussi. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez toujours me contacter sur mon cellulaire.

Title: Beautiful Townhouse for rent in Brossard, recent construction
Description:
Beautiful town house located at the heart of Brossard, 15min to downtown of Montreal, 5 minute to Dix30 area. Convenient with public transportation and close to supermarket, excellent school and day care in the surrounding area. Municipal park is right behind the garden, and public swim pool within 5 min walking. Municipal library access within 8 min by car. Good neighborhood, quiet and secured area.

House were built in 2013. 2 storeys with basement fully finished. 1571 square feet living area (excluding basement). 3 bedrooms and one bathroom (separated shower and bath) on the second floor, Kitchen, dinning room, living room and powder room on the first floor. Indoor single garage and outside driveway.
Second bathroom with shower in basement, also a large family room.
Electric heated and thermopump (air conditioning included).

It will be available starting from December 1st, 2017. Credit check will be required.
Furniture, electricity and water costs not included. Pets not allowed.

Manifique maison en rangee contruite en 2013 avec un sous-sol fini avec salle de bain complete.
Situe dans un secteur tres recherche, a 5 minutes du populaire Quartier Dix30 et a 10 minute du centre -ville de Montreal.
Tres lumineux avec 3 chambres a coucher donc 1 avec walk-in, garage simple avec stationnement a l'exterieur pour 2 voiture compact.
le service de transport public est tres pres (bus 32, 38 pour Bonaventure en direct) 
Ecole et garderie a quelque pas, grand terrain de soccer and parc pour petit est juste en arriere de la maison. Piscine public a 6 minute a pied.

Disponible en Decembre ou un peu plustot.

Title: Beautiful condo 3 1/2  Au centre-ville Meublé
Description:
Luxueux condo 3 1/2 à louer meublé à louer au centre-ville de Montréal, à deux pas des rues Sainte-Catherine et Sherbrooke. Vous offre une chambre à coucher, un espace cuisine, salle à manger et salon à aire ouverte, ainsi qu'une vaste fenestration laissant entrer la lumière naturelle.  

Faisant partie d'un complexe d'habitation de luxe, vous apprécierez l'insonorisation supérieure que seul peut procurer. Le condo en question inclut les électroménagers haut de gamme et est aménagé à partir de matériaux de haute qualité. La cuisine est de design Italien Scavolini.  Situé au cœur de l'action. vous profiterez d'espaces communs alliant style et élégance, sécurité 24 heures.

Title: one bedroom-Mcgill-downtown Montreal, Metro Place-des-arts
Description:
Downtown Montreal apartment.

All the luxuries of urban living are right outside the front door.

3505 St. Famille is located in a friendly vibrant area of Montreal, just south of the trendy Plateau area. Transportation is very close - only 6 minute walk to Place-des-Arts metro and 8 minute walk to Sherbrooke metro, McGill University is 5 minutes walk away and Mont-Royal Parc is a short walk away.
Building is located on a residential and peaceful street, near all of the necessary services; banks, post office, grocery stores, pharmacy, and restaurants.
Convenience and ease of living are two great features of this property.

Appartements au centre ville de Montréal.

Tout le luxe de la vie urbaine devant votre porte.

3505 St. Famille est situé dans un quartier amical et animé de Montréal, se trouvant juste au sud de la place en vogue du Plateau, Les transports sont très - seulement à 6 minutes à pied de la Station Place-des-Arts et à 8 minutes à pied de la station Sherbrooke, L'université McGill est à 5 minutes à pied et le parc Mont-Royal est également tout proche.
Le bâtiment est localisé dans une rue tranquille et résidentielle, proche de tous les services nécessaires; banque, bureau de poste, épiceries, pharmacies, et restaurants.
La simplicité et l'aisance de vivre sont les deux grands avantages de cette propriété.

Title: metro et marché jean-Talon, Villeray petite-patrie
Description:
6994 3e sud

Superbe appartement, beaucoup de cachet,  spacieux, planchers  bois franc, 3e étage, très lumineux (fenêtres côté est, sud et ouest).  Fraichement rénové.  Belle rue avec grands arbres.  Près du marché et métro Jean-Talon (ligne orange et bleue).  Services à moins de 3 min de marche (Boulangerie au coin de la rue, 2 épiceries, pharmacies, piste cyclable).  
3 pièces fermées et salon ouvert sur la cuisine.   Lave-vaisselle et sécheuse neufs inclus.
Non-fumeur.  Pour maintenir la quiétude de l'endroit, un maximum de 2 locataires qui habitent l'appartement.   
Superb apartment, great location, high ceilings, wood floors, lots of natural lighting (windows on Est, South and West sides) . Located near Jean Talon market and metro station, cycling path and many trees on the street. 3 minutes walk to grocery stores, drug stores. Bakery right on the street corner. 
3 closed rooms plus dining room adjacent  to kitchen
Just renovated, includes dishwasher, dryer..
Non smoker and maximum of two tenants to insure quiet and peaceful occupancy of building residents (owners live in the ground floor apartment)
Manon

Title: Cession de bail en urgence de notre 3 1/2 refait à neuf !!
Description:
Nous devons rentrer en France en urgence fin octobre 2017, nous libérons donc notre 3 1/2 semi-meublé (200$ de déposit pour le four et le frigo qui vous sera remis à votre départ) en demi sous-sol pour le 1er novembre 2017 lumineux (voir avant), refait à neuf ainsi que l'isolation complète du logement. L'eau chaude est comprise mais pas l'électricité (environ 60$ pour 2 mois l'hiver).
Loué non meublé, possibilité de rachat de nos meubles neufs IKEA sans punaises de lit (table basse, matelas 2 personnes neuf, couette chaude, 2 oreillers linge de lit + canapé lit) et le nécessaire de cuisine. Vous avez une laverie (laveuse / sécheuse) dans l'immeuble.
NON FUMEUR, PAS D'ANIMAUX.
Notre bail va jusqu'en juin 2018 idéal si vous souhaiter faire un roadtrip pour l'été.

Le bus 18 est au pied de l'immeuble qui rejoint la station Beaubien (ligne orange) en 20 minutes.
Le bus 131 est également au pied de l'immeuble (trottoir d'en face) qui rejoint la station Assomption (ligne verte) en 8 minutes, la station Berry UQAM en 20 minutes.

Magasin IGA et Métro à 5 minutes à pied, nombreux café, restaurants, dépanneurs à proximité, parc Maisonneuve à 10 minutes à pied.

Merci de nous contacter par téléphone 
 
 pour planifier les visites (préférable car pas de wifi).

Title: Notre-Dame-de-Grace Impeccable 3 1/2 Appartements Place Cavendish Dis
Description: Cet immeuble de 365 logements à louer a été construit au milieu des années 1970. Moderne, impeccablement entretenu et sécuritaire, il est situé au Sud de la rue Sherbrooke Ouest dans le quartier N.D.G. Son emplacement unique permet d'accéder aux autoroutes 13, 15, 20 et 720 en quelques minutes à peine. Pour ceux qui se déplacent par le transport en commun, la station de métro Vendôme est à 8 minutes par autobus. Deux épiceries, une kyrielle de boutiques, une pharmacie, une SAQ Sélection, le Quartier Cavendish et le Carrefour Angrignon sont tous à proximité. Le campus Loyola de l'Université Concordia est à 9 minutes en autobus ou 15 minutes à pied. Un dépanneur se trouve dans l'immeuble. Le nouveau Centre Universitaire de Santé McGill (CUSM) se trouve tout près.--- english version ---This modern and safe complex was built in the mid '70s. Containing apartments for rent in West Montreal, it is carefully maintained, in tip-top shape, and located in the beautiful neighbourhood of NDG, just South of Sherbrooke Street West. It is ideally located for quick access to many expressways - 13, 15, 20 and 720. Public transit users will appreciate the fact the Vendôme metro station is only 8 minutes away by bus. In terms of services, two grocery stores, a myriad of shops, a drugstore, an SAQ Selection liquor store and two shopping malls - Cavendish Mall and Carrefour Angrignon - are all located nearby. Finally, the building is a quick 15 minute walk or 9 minute bus ride from the Loyola campus of Concordia University, the new McGill University Health Centre (MUHC) is also nearby and a convenience store is open on the premises.

Title: Fall Forecast at the Flex! 1br swish pad near Concordia and McGill
Description:
The Flex Condominium project located in the heart of downtown Montreal, close to restaurants, shops and all trendy Montreal attractions. Literally a few minutes walk to everything including two major universities, shopping, cafes and bistros, fine-dining, metro stations, and everything downtown has to offer.

Flex is a 10-storey building with a heated rooftop saltwater pool, sun deck, workout room, sauna, and a residents' lounge. A mix of modern and elegance, nothing beats being in the Flex for the true downtowner.

Available Dec. 1, 2017
Minimum one year lease

-1br/1bth modern suite
-Floor to ceiling windows with sliding door to private balcony
-All appliances included
-Washer/dryer en suite
-Utilities to be arranged and assumed by tenant
-No parking/locker available

*Credit worthiness and background checks will be performed.

Title: Sweet Stuff! 1br suite at the Lowney. PARKING & LOCKER INCL
Description:
In a new development attached to the former Lowney Chocolate Factory, a delectable open-concept 1br awaits the urban professional looking for swell digs deep in the heart of the city. Nestled in Griffintown, where converted industrial buildings mix in with the new builds, nothing says hip and professional like living at The Lowney. 

Neighbouring Old Montreal to the east where history comes alive with its old landmarks and cobble-stone streets, the Lachine Canal to the south where the health conscious flock for a quick jog through its nature-path, and the financial hub to the north where the best and brightest gather for the latest business innovation, experience how the true-blue urban city dweller really lives. 

Location:
400 De L'Inspecteur in between St. Paul and William Streets.

Nearby:
Griffintown's fine shoppes, supermarkets, bistros and cafes, Downtown, Bonaventure, Square Victoria, Old Montreal, and the Canal.

What you get:
A tranquil and spacious open-concept 1br suite with a walk-through closet to laundry room, full kitchen, 3pc bath. Gym access for the fitness inspired. Rooftop terrace with infinity pool, barbecues, and tables for outdoor dining. 

Included:
All stainless steel appliances, wall-unit air-conditioning, family-size washer & dryer, cluster light chandelier, window coverings, ceiling fan, all attached shelving and fixtures. Parking and locker available.
Extras:
Utilities, cable, wifi.

Title: Mellow and Vibrant! Brand new 1br suite in St-Henri development
Description:
St-Henri village is home to some of the most beautiful old buildings in Montreal, one of which is the old post office now converted to a fitness facility attached to a new development called Henri Condominiums. Henri Condominiums is a quick drive or metro ride (Place St-Henri metro station one block away) to downtown Montreal, Old Montreal, Westmount, Atwater, and pretty much anywhere you want to be. For the fitness inspired, Henri Condominiums is a quick jaunt to the Lachine canal with its peaceful nature path for a sprint or jog, bike ride, or a leisurely stroll.

Henri Condominiums is a brand new residential complex featuring:
Concrete and steel structure
Private balconies or terraces
Floor-ceiling windows
Rooftop terrace with BBQ area and firepit lounge
Bicycle racks
Landscaped interior garden
Gymnasium and fitness clinic

Available now is a spic and span one bedroom suite with a full kitchen, a 4pce bath, ensuite washer and dryer, wood flooring, tons of storage, and a balcony overlooking the courtyard garden.

Requirements:
Minimum one year lease
Credit and background check
Civil liability insurance

*Vacation stays or short-term strictly prohibited. NO AIRBNB. Fines will be imposed on a daily basis.

Title: Downtown studio with a den, fully furnished
Description:
Live the Exclusiveness!

O'Nessy offers high end services exclusively to its residents: a pool, a gym, a yoga room, a friendly lounge place to hang out, etc. Everything will take place in a historical and magnificient location.

Live at the heart of effervescence and knowledge!

Shaughnessy Village is one of the most dynamic districts in Montreal and hosts a lot of services such as Concordia University, Dawson and LaSalle Colleges, many metro stations and the Canadian Centre for Architecture.
Live the purity of design and architecture!

Conçu pour le confort, chauffage par rayonnement, climatisation central très silencieux, système d'alarme, accès à 4 satellites et l'internet, avec deux terrasses sur le toit avec une vue panoramique de la montagne et centre-ville.

Disponible avec 5 gros electros ($50/mois): réfrigérateur, cuisinière, et lave-vaisselle en acier inoxydable, et une laveuse et sécheuse.

Title: Stunning 4 1/2 in Beautiful Mile End | Très belle 4 1/2 à Mile End
Description:
English (French to follow):

Available now! 

Beautiful apartment with charming wainscotting situated on Laurier Ouest in the heart of Mile End. The apartment is on the third floor, overlooking a lovely courtyard with a cute little fire escape that we've enjoyed sitting many a nights on while drinking wine and listening to the public piano below. Close to all the wonderful places of Mile End and Outremont including, but not limited to:

- Fairmount street (bagels, breakfast, and adorable little shops)
- Bernard street (Drawn & Quarterly, and record stores galore)
- 2 grocery stores (PA and PA Nature)
- SAQ select 
- all the best restaurants where you can eat to your hearts delight! 

We've had two really amazing years here and are sad to let go of this charming place but must follow new paths. You'll experience a great deal of light (perfect for growing plants or just to enjoy) and since it's a corner unit, the place gets a really wonderful cross breeze. The apartment also includes: 

- new oven (acquired last winter)
- 3 closets
- awesome radiators to keep you warm in winter
- water + gas
- Laundry in the building 

And, if you need it, we'll leave you our air conditioning unit as we no longer need it!

Call, text, or email if interested.

----------------------------------------

Francais:

Disponible immédiatement!

Bel appartement au rez-de-chaussée charmant situé sur Laurier Ouest au coeur de Mile End. L'appartement se trouve au troisième étage, donnant sur une jolie cour avec une jolie petite évasion de feu où nous avons apprécié assis plusieurs nuits en buvant du vin et en écoutant le piano public ci-dessous. Près de tous les endroits merveilleux de Mile End et Outremont, y compris, mais sans s'y limiter:

- Rue Fairmount (bagels, petit déjeuner et petites boutiques adorables)
- La rue Bernard (Drawn & Quarterly, et les magasins de disques à gogo)
- 2 épiceries (PA et PA Nature)
- Sélection SAQ
Tous les meilleurs restaurants

Nous avons eu deux années vraiment étonnantes ici et nous sommes tristes de quitté cet endroit charmant, mais nous devons suivre de nouveaux chemins. L'appartement reçoit beaucoup de lumière (parfait pour faire pousser des plantes ou simplement pour profiter) et, comme c'est une unité de coin, l'endroit offre une très belle brise croisée. L'appartement inclus aussi:

- nouveau four (acquis l'hiver dernier)
- 3 placards
- Radiateurs géniaux pour vous garder au chaud en hiver
- eau + gaz
- Laverie dans le bâtiment

Et, si vous en avez besoin, nous vous laisserons notre unité de conditionnement d'air car nous n'en avons plus besoin!

Appel, texte ou courriel si vous êtes intéressé.

Description:

Large New Construction 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom unit in a great neighborhood! The unit offers modern and contemporary finishes, an open concept floor plan and a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances. The master bedroom features a large walk in closet and lots of storage space. Very quiet unit with 2 private balconies, the perfect space for professionals or families.

Title: $1500 / 1br - 650ft2 - Luxury condo with furniture at Berri-UQAM,downt
Description:
Lease from 1st Nov 2017 until end of June.

Version française à la suite 

Condo Description 
It is a brand new condo with furniture for rent, on St-Denis Street corner of Rene Levesque Blvd, and ONLY 3 MIN WALK from Berri-Uqam Metro. Few blocks from the shops and restaurants of St-Denis Street and Performing Arts Quarter of Place-des-Arts, nice choice to enjoy the best of Montreal. The proximity of McGill and UQAM (directly in front) universities is extremely convenient for students, Saint-Luc hospital directly in front of building, and Old Montreal is 500 meters away. 

This brand new condo offers one large closed bedroom + large walkin closet, a spacious open space concept living-room, a modern bathroom with 2 in 1 Italian style shower, washer and dryer are include. contemporary kitchen fully equipped brand new appliances in stainless steel + lots of storage space, and large windows facing south overlooking a beautiful balcony located at the front. Brand new engineered wood floors in living-room and bedroom and kitchen, and ceramic floor in the bathroom. 

Building is brand new construction finished in 2014. You can move around on foot, by bicycle or metro: Old Montreal, downtown, Quartier des Arts, Mont-Royal, Gay Village, bike paths, etc. During winter, you can just cross streets, get into UQAM University to get to metro. The ideal address for trendy downtown Montrealers! 

Condo Details 

Address: 1150 Saint-Denis 
Total Living Area: 645 square 
Brand new appliances in stainless steel: Stove, Oven, Dish Washer, Micro-Wave, Refrigerator, Laundry washer and dryer, and Heat Pump for Heating and Air Conditioning. 
Desktop for kitchen and washroom: White Quartz counter 
Screen for visitor check 
Condo unit door lock with key and password 
Concrete modern ceiling for a contemporary look 
9ft floor to ceiling for spacious luxurious living environment 

INCLUDED 
Hot water and cold water 
Furniture: sofa, coffee table, dining table and chairs, bookcases, full size bed, chandeliers, decorative paintings 
Appliances: refrigerator, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, stove，microwave 

What's not included in your rent: 
Electricity, heating, internet, indoor parking ($200) 

Metro Station: Berri Uqam (orange and green line) WITHIN 3 MINUTE WALK! 

Building Features: 

Convenience store and future commercial stores on the ground level 
Outdoor Pool 
Security Cameras 
Elevators 
Bicycles parking space 
Rooftop terrace that looks out over the city below with urban chalet and BBQ area 
Gym 
Wheelchair accessible 
Le Metropol is a unique condominium project that lords over the corner of boulevard René-Lévesque East and rue Saint-Denis, in the heart of Montreal's Quartier Latin. At the top of the building there is a gym, an urban chalet, a pool, and a terrace that looks out over the city below, and also can see the fireworks directly 

Conditions: 

Non smoking 
Pets are not allowed 
Capacity: 2 persons max. (one people or a couple) 
Term: One year lease 
Availability: Starting Nov 1, 2017 


Neighbourhood Features 

Less than 5 min away by foot:

Description de Condo 

Le nouveau condo à louer est sur la rue St -Denis coin de la blvd René-Lévesque, et SEULEMENT 1 MIN À PIED DU MÉTRO station Berri-UQAM. Seulement à 5 minutes à pied des commerces et restaurants de la rue Saint-Denis et Quartier des arts de la Place -des-Arts, vous permettra de profiter au mieux de Montréal. La proximité de l'Université McGill et de l'universités UQAM (juste en face) est pratique pour les étudiants, hôpital du St-Luc directement en face du bâtiment, et le Vieux-Montréal est dans une station de métro. 
Cette complètement nouvelle condo offre une grande chambre fermée + grande salle penderie (chambre de garde robe), une salle de séjour spacieuse à aire ouverte, une salle de bains moderne, laveuse et sécheuse, une cuisine contemporaine entièrement équipée de nouveaux appareils en acier inoxydable + de beaucoup d'espace de stockage, et grandes fenêtres en direction sud donnant sur un beau balcon situé à l'avant. Nouveaux planchers de bois. 

Le bâtiment est neuf construction de 2014. Vous pouvez vous déplacer à pied, en vélo ou en métro: Vieux-Montréal, le centre-ville, Quartier des Arts, Mont-Royal, Village de gai, pistes cyclables, etc. L'adresse idéale pour le centre-ville à la mode Montréalais!

Title: Luxury condo with furniture at Berri-UQAM,downtown to rent, from Nov.
Description:
Lease from 1st Nov 2017 until end of June.
Version française à la suite 

Condo Description 
It is a brand new condo with furniture for rent, on St-Denis Street corner of Rene Levesque Blvd, and ONLY 3 MIN WALK from Berri-Uqam Metro. Few blocks from the shops and restaurants of St-Denis Street and Performing Arts Quarter of Place-des-Arts, nice choice to enjoy the best of Montreal. The proximity of McGill and UQAM (directly in front) universities is extremely convenient for students, Saint-Luc hospital directly in front of building, and Old Montreal is 500 meters away. 

This brand new condo offers one large closed bedroom + large walkin closet, a spacious open space concept living-room, a modern bathroom with 2 in 1 Italian style shower, washer and dryer are include. contemporary kitchen fully equipped brand new appliances in stainless steel + lots of storage space, and large windows facing south overlooking a beautiful balcony located at the front. Brand new engineered wood floors in living-room and bedroom and kitchen, and ceramic floor in the bathroom. 

Building is brand new construction finished in 2014. You can move around on foot, by bicycle or metro: Old Montreal, downtown, Quartier des Arts, Mont-Royal, Gay Village, bike paths, etc. During winter, you can just cross streets, get into UQAM University to get to metro. The ideal address for trendy downtown Montrealers! 

Condo Details 

Address: 1150 Saint-Denis 
Total Living Area: 645 square 
Brand new appliances in stainless steel: Stove, Oven, Dish Washer, Micro-Wave, Refrigerator, Laundry washer and dryer, and Heat Pump for Heating and Air Conditioning. 
Desktop for kitchen and washroom: White Quartz counter 
Screen for visitor check 
Condo unit door lock with key and password 
Concrete modern ceiling for a contemporary look 
9ft floor to ceiling for spacious luxurious living environment 

INCLUDED 
Hot water and cold water 
Furniture: sofa, coffee table, dining table and chairs, bookcases, full size bed, chandeliers, decorative paintings 
Appliances: refrigerator, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, stove，microwave 

What's not included in your rent: 
Electricity, heating, internet, indoor parking ($200) 

Metro Station: Berri Uqam (orange and green line) WITHIN 3 MINUTE WALK! 

Building Features: 

Convenience store and future commercial stores on the ground level 
Outdoor Pool 
Security Cameras 
Elevators 
Bicycles parking space 
Rooftop terrace that looks out over the city below with urban chalet and BBQ area 
Gym 
Wheelchair accessible 
Le Metropol is a unique condominium project that lords over the corner of boulevard René-Lévesque East and rue Saint-Denis, in the heart of Montreal's Quartier Latin. At the top of the building there is a gym, an urban chalet, a pool, and a terrace that looks out over the city below, and also can see the fireworks directly 

Conditions: 

Non smoking 
Pets are not allowed 
Capacity: 2 persons max. (one people or a couple) 
Term: One year lease or until the end of June
Availability: Starting Nov 1, 2017

Title: Downtown metro UQAM/CHUM luxury 3 1/2 condo for rent, from Nov.
Description:
Lease from 1st Nov 2017 until end of June.

Version française à la suite 

Condo Description 
It is a brand new condo with furniture for rent, on St-Denis Street corner of Rene Levesque Blvd, and ONLY 3 MIN WALK from Berri-Uqam Metro. Few blocks from the shops and restaurants of St-Denis Street and Performing Arts Quarter of Place-des-Arts, nice choice to enjoy the best of Montreal. The proximity of McGill and UQAM (directly in front) universities is extremely convenient for students, Saint-Luc hospital directly in front of building, and Old Montreal is 500 meters away. 

This brand new condo offers one large closed bedroom + large walkin closet, a spacious open space concept living-room, a modern bathroom with 2 in 1 Italian style shower, washer and dryer are include. contemporary kitchen fully equipped brand new appliances in stainless steel + lots of storage space, and large windows facing south overlooking a beautiful balcony located at the front. Brand new engineered wood floors in living-room and bedroom and kitchen, and ceramic floor in the bathroom. 

Building is brand new construction finished in 2014. You can move around on foot, by bicycle or metro: Old Montreal, downtown, Quartier des Arts, Mont-Royal, Gay Village, bike paths, etc. During winter, you can just cross streets, get into UQAM University to get to metro. The ideal address for trendy downtown Montrealers! 

Condo Details 

Address: 1150 Saint-Denis 
Total Living Area: 645 square 
Brand new appliances in stainless steel: Stove, Oven, Dish Washer, Micro-Wave, Refrigerator, Laundry washer and dryer, and Heat Pump for Heating and Air Conditioning. 
Desktop for kitchen and washroom: White Quartz counter 
Screen for visitor check 
Condo unit door lock with key and password 
Concrete modern ceiling for a contemporary look 
9ft floor to ceiling for spacious luxurious living environment 

INCLUDED 
Hot water and cold water

Appliances: refrigerator, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, stove，microwave 

What's not included in your rent: 
Electricity, heating, internet, indoor parking ($200) 

Metro Station: Berri Uqam (orange and green line) WITHIN 3 MINUTE WALK! 

Building Features: 

Convenience store and future commercial stores on the ground level 
Outdoor Pool 
Security Cameras 
Elevators 
Bicycles parking space 
Rooftop terrace that looks out over the city below with urban chalet and BBQ area 
Gym 
Wheelchair accessible

At the top of the building there is a gym, an urban chalet, a pool, and a terrace that looks out over the city below, and also can see the fireworks directly

Title: LARGE Renovated Apartment & Parking Old MTL
Description:
Call Joanne - 
 

The perfect loft in fabulous location near Square Victoria / Cité Multimédia! Freshly painted in white, kitchen redone with modern hwite cabinets and black stone counter-tops. Stainless steel appliances. About 1200sf of living space, 2 bedrooms (large master bedroom is semi-closed on a podium, second bedroom with French doors, ideal as guest room, office, den). High ceilings, gorgeous hardwood floors, oversized ceiling,gorgeous industrial details, western exposure offers beautiful sunlight in the afternoons. Lots of storage space, in-unit laundry, locker and garage included. Rooftop patio with pool, BBQs and stunning views of the Old Port and Dopwntown Monteral. Credit and background check required. Easy to visit!
Le loft parfait dans un emplacement fabuleux près de Square Victoria / Cité Multimédia! Fraîchement peint en blanc, refait à la cuisine avec des armoires moderne en hwite et des comptoirs en pierre noire. Appareils en acier inoxydable. Environ 1200 pieds carrés d'habitation, 2 chambres (grande chambre principale semi-fermée sur un podium, deuxième chambre avec portes françaises, idéales en chambre d'hôtes, bureau, salon). Les hauts plafonds, les beaux planchers de bois franc, le plafond surdimensionné, les détails industriels magnifiques, l'exposition occidentale offrent une belle lumière du soleil l'après-midi. Beaucoup d'espace de stockage, de linge dans l'unité, d'un casier et d'un garage inclus. Terrasse sur le toit avec piscine, barbecue et vue imprenable sur le Vieux-Port et Dopwntown Monteral. /

Everything included : electricity, heating, hot water, fridge and oven. 
Interior and exterior parking available.

Title: Furnished 2 bedroom apartment - Medium/Long term rental
Description:
Beautiful furnished 2 bedroom apartment, all in

Sunny, fully furnished, all included, top floor, two bedroom apartment, nicely located in quiet neighborhood near downtown. 

Master bedroom with queen size bed, second bedroom with fold out couch (comfortably sleeps 2). Fully equipped kitchen with washer, dryer, microwave, and dishwasher. 

The apartment is ideal for 2 people - for 4 people maximum. 
Minimum stay 1 month - Available 16 October

Seeking quiet tenants.

All included: WiFi, Cable TV, Netflix, electricity, heating. 
Quiet neighborhood (Rosemont Petite-Patrie, near Plateau), near several restaurants, cafés, bars, movie theater, convenience stores, pharmacies, botanical gardens, and several beautiful parks. Several restaurants and stores in the neighborhood and the wonderful bakery/bistro "Froment et de Sève" for treats!

Public transportation (Metro, bus). Bixi (bike sharing) 

Great value!

No smoking, no pets.


___

5 ½ très lumineux tout équipé dans Rosemont
	
1 600,00 $

5 ½ très lumineux tout équipé dans Rosemont - Sunny Rosemont apt -- all included 

à louer, courte durée, minimum 1 mois. 
Complètement meublé et équipé. 

Situé au cœur du quartier Rosemont, sur la 12ème, au deuxième étage d'un duplex, près de deux lignes d'autobus. Métro St-Michel (ligne bleue) à 10 min. à pied. Appartement très paisible. 


CARACTÉRISTIQUES : Quartier : Rosemont. Métros : quelques minutes à pied de la station de métro St-Michel. Capacité : jusqu'à 5 personnes. Nombre de pièces : 5 ½ (2 chambres fermées, salon, cuisine, salle de bain et salle de rangement) Stationnement facile sur la rue. Superficie: environ 1000 pi. ca. Étage : deuxième étage d'un duplex 

Location au mois: 1 600 $ 
Minimum 1 mois. 
Disponible 16 octobre. 

PROXIMITÉ ET ENVIRONS : Cinéma Beaubien, Parc Molson, Parc Beaubien, Jardin botanique, Planétarium, CEGEP Rosemont , Épicerie Provigo juste à côté. Plusieurs restos et la boulangerie de Froment et de Sève pour se gâter!


COMMODITÉS 
Électricité et chauffage électrique compris 
Thermostats électroniques dans chacune des pièces 
Coin bureau avec table de travail 
Cuisinière frigo lave-vaisselle et micro- ondes 
Laveuse et sécheuse 
Literie et serviettes 
Fer et planche à repasser 
Wifi, Internet haute-vitesse 
TV avec câble et Netflix 
Lecteur DVD 
Lits : un grand lit deux places; divan convertible en lit double dans la deuxième chambre
Logement sans fumée 
Salle de bain avec bain-douche et puit de lumière 
Vaisselle, casseroles et coutellerie 
Balcon couvert donnant sur la rue


À qui la chance?!

A modest room ELSEWERE is 400$, an average one is 500$. For 3$ more a day OUR ROOM has ALL different: the room itself, the condo, the building, the area, the furniture, the [6] appliances etc. 
Group of friends/colleagues VERY welcomed. Huge double room with 2 beds for 2 persons 799 all in (this only in h4x1w4 area - where I have also regular rooms for 599 all in).
3) Promo "LOW SEASON MEDIUM TERM" AND "LONG TERM ALL FURNISHED 9-12 Months+":
Furnished (Including linen, towels, complete kitchenware): 1449$/month and 1569$/month for 2bdr 2baths; 1679$/month for 3bdr 2 bathrooms * 
NEED ALL INCLUDED? 1649 and 1769 for 2bdr 2baths; 1879$/month for 3bdr 2 bathrooms means really ALL, see next paragraphe.
YES, long term, unfurnished and no utilities is much cheaper... because it is a totally different service and different level of stress and effort for me... So: short term (+$$$), furnished (+$$$), services/utilities included (+$$$), wi-fi, TV (+$$$), linen towels, kitchenware (+$$$)

4) ALL INCLUDED PROMO HIGH SEASON: 109$/day* 
If you take "HIGH season only" = HIGH prices** (+$$$$). Salmon filet is not at the same price as the whole salmon, right? :) You want only a part and the best one ...
So, June to October, 1*-4 months: Promo 109$/day. This is a PROMO, regular price short term is from 150-199$/day in HIGH season. Weekends/festivals up to 399/day! LOW season - 99$/day - NOT vice-versa! 
If you're a tourist, min more than 31 days. *1 month might not qualify for the promo, to discuss.
WHY THIS IS A PROMO??? 
109$=90+tx/day, this hardly pays you a hotel room (in high season, a MOTEL!!! room). For the same price, taking my condo you'll have 1160-1200sf, 2 (or 3) bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, huge living-room, kitchen etc in a new building 4 km from Downtown. 
So... it can be considered discounted, in a hotel this space would be their biggest HOTEL SUITE and would rent for 350$/day + :)... And about double in high season!!! 
MENTION: these are short term HIGH SEASON prices NOT Downtown prices. If you saw this price in Downtown: (1) it's not for this size/quality of condo and/or (2) it is not high season price and/or (3) it's not available because it was booked 6-12 months in advance :))) 


CONCLUSION 
Ideally call 51four 66ZERO 312TWO for more details and visit. If no answer LEAVE MESSAGE with basic info (and write them down for yourself) and "Ad ID" (starts with "6", 10 figures) AND answer the ad, I'LL CALL BACK 100%. SMS? ONLY with AD id/number (not so efficient a first contact).

Title: FURNISHED apartment meublé pool&more GREAT $$
Description:
CAll Joanne - 
 
 ***Stunning, spacious corner unit lofts***Quartier des Spectacles***

pool, rooftop patio with BBQ area and views, cardio equipment, 24/7 doorman All appliances. Storage locker. Offered furnished or non-furnished. 

Absolutely beautiful, sunny and spacious one-bedroom corner-unit at the luxurious Lofts des Arts. Perfect location in the vibrant Quartiers des Spectacles, steps from St. Laurent metro, UQAM, Place des Arts, endless restaurants, cafés, shops and a short walk from McGill campus. Option to rent fully furnished, or with appliances only. Lovely open views, lots of natural light, quality finishes, high ceilings, central A/C, and generous open concept living space. Storage locker included. No parking.

The building offers 24/7 doorman and security, a fabulous rooftop paradise with large pool, BBQ and lounging areas, with panoramic views of the city and Mount Royal. 

No pets, no smokers, lease until June 30, 2018 with option to renew. Credit check Easy to visit!

DESCRIPTION: New building, just 5 minutes drive from Downtown! - H4A 0A2. 2BDR 2BTH condo, 1160SF, with 2 persons JACUZZI (or 3 if you like :-) )!  10min walk from metro Vendome! -or 3min by bus. Park, school, daycare, 3 utility stores in 150 meters!  With Wi-Fi, TV, all ready, all you need OR long term nothing included OR including furniture/utilities.
 (3BDR 2BTH ALSO AVAILABLE, ASK!)

PRICES:	
1) PROMO " 1 YEAR +" : 
Starting September or later: 1299/month and 1399/month for 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms; 1499$/month for 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms. 6 stainless steel/frontal appliances could be included, ask. Add 12% if you need it completely furnished + linen, towels, complete kitchenware.

OTHER RENTING POSSIBILITIES: If your renting period you need is different, pls see down here  (by room, short, medium long term etc):

2) Promo BY ROOM. 499 (nothing included)- 599/month (all included-preffered) for a cvasi-luxury room. These are not the average student rooms, we target non-modests students, postgraduates, teachers, young professionals etc.  
A modest room ELSEWERE is 400$, an average one is 500$. For 3$ more a day OUR ROOM has ALL different: the room itself, the condo, the building, the area, the furniture, the [6] appliances etc.  
Group of friends/colleagues VERY welcomed.  Huge double room with 2 beds for 2 persons 799 all in (this only in h4x1w4 area - where I have also regular rooms for 599 all in).

3) Promo "LOW SEASON MEDIUM TERM" AND "LONG TERM ALL FURNISHED 9-12 Months+":
Furnished (Including linen, towels, compelte kitchenware): 1449$/month and 1569$/month for 2bdr 2baths; 1679$/month for 3bdr 2 bathrooms * 
ALL INCLUDED? 1649 and 1769 for 2bdr 2baths; 1879$/month for 3bdr 2 bathrooms means really ALL, see next paragraphe.
YES, long term, unfurnished and no utilities is much cheaper... because it is a totally different service and different level of stress and effort for me... So: short term (+$$$), furnished (+$$$), services/utilities included (+$$$), wi-fi, TV (+$$$), linen towels, kitchenware (+$$$).

4) ALL INCLUDED PROMO HIGH SEASON: 109$/day* 
If you take "HIGH season only" = HIGH prices** (+$$$$). Salmon filet is not at the same price as the whole salmon, right? :) You want only a part and the best one ...
 So, June to October, 1*-4 months: Promo 109$/day. This is a PROMO, regular price short term is from 150-199$/day in HIGH season. Weekends/festivals up to 399/day! LOW season - 99$/day - NOT vice-versa! 
If you're a tourist, min more than 31 days. *1 month might not qualify for the promo, to discuss.
WHY THIS IS A PROMO??? 
109$=90+tx/day, this hardly pays you a hotel room (in high season, a MOTEL!!! room) . For same price, taking my condo you'll have 1160-1200sf, 2 (or 3) bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living-room, kitchen etc in a new building 4 km from Downtown. 
So... it can be considered discounted, in a hotel this space would be their biggest HOTEL SUITE and would rent for 350$/day + :)... And about double in high season!!! 
MENTION: these are short term HIGH SEASON prices NOT Downtown prices. If you saw this price in Downtown: (1) it's not for this size/quality of condo and/or (2) it is not high season price and/or (3) it's not available because it was booked 6-12 months in advance :))) 
 

CONCLUSION 
Ideally call 51four 66ZERO 312TWO for more details and visit. If no answer LEAVE MESSAGE with basic info (and write it down for yourself) and "Ad ID" (starts with "6", 10 figures) AND answer the ad, I'LL CALL BACK 100%. SMS? ONLY with AD id/number (not so efficient a first contact). 

*Exceptions/ conditions could apply. 7Se15CLt cmar condos
(2 &3 bdr, 2 bathrooms available here -H4A-0A2; Also!!! Upper duplex ~1500sf 3bdr 2 bath in H4X1W3 from 1299, ask)

3)Promo " MOYEN TERM BAS SAISON" ET "LONG TERM MEUBLE/ TOUT INCLUS 9-12months+": 
MEUBLE (incluant literie, serviettes, cuisine completement utilee): 1449 et 1569 pour 4 1/ 2 ( 2CAC 2SDB); 1679$/moIS pour 5 1/ 2 ( 3CAC 2SDB); *
TOUT INCLUS: 1649 et 1769 pour 4 1/ 2 ( 2CAC 2SDB); 1879$/mois pour 5 1/ 2 ( 3CAC 2SDB); *

Oui, long terme, non meuble et services non-inclus coute beaucoup moins cher que court terme... parce que location court term est un service totalement different et demande un niveau de stress et effort totalement different pour moi. Donc: court terme (+ $$$), meuble (+ $$$), services inclus (+ $$$), WI-FI, TV  (+$$$), literie, serviettes, equipment de cuisine (+$$$) et haute saison (+ $$$$ ),

 Donc, 1*-4 mois de juin a octobre: de 109$/jour. Ceci est un PROMOTION, prix regulier court terme de 150-199$/jour -199+ $ / jour. Fin-semaines/festivals jusqu'a 399/jour!! Bas season - 99$/day , PAS vice-versa! Si vous etes tourists, plus de 31 jours minimum. *1mois peut ne pas etre eligible pour la promo, a discuter.
POUR QUOI  C'EST UN PROMO??? 
109$=90+tx /jour, ca paye a peine une chambre d'hotel (ou en effet MOTEL en haute saison!!!). Pour meme prix, en prennat mon condo, vous disposez de 1160-1200pc, 2 chambres a coucher (ou 3, demandez!), deux salles de bains, salon, cuisine etc dans un nouveau bâtiment a 4 km du centre-ville. Alors ...mon condo est en promotion, dans un hotel ca sera le plus garnde APPARTAMENT (SUITE) a 350$/jour!!! Et ~ le double en haute saison!!!

Si vous avez vu ce prix dans Centre-ville, (1) ce n'est pas pour cette GRANDEUR/ QUALITE de condo et/ou (2) n'est pas un prix de haute saison et/ou (3) ce n'est pas disponible car il a ete loue 6 -12 mois à l'avance :))) 

CONCLUSION: Idealement appelez 51 quatre. 66ZERO 312DEUX pour details et visite, si pas de reponse immediate, laisez message avec info de base (notez les aussi pour vous), "Code d'annonce" - (commence avec "6", 10 cifres) et repondez a l'annonce, je vais vous recontacter a 100%. Title: 4.5, rue Duff a Pierrefonds    4.5, Duff Street, Pierrefonds
Description:
4.5, rue Duff a Pierrefonds    4.5, Duff Street, Pierrefonds
RENOVATED
Situe dans un sixplex, ce logement de 4 pieces comporte deux chambres fermees.  Plusieurs renovations recentes dont l'electricite, portes et fenetres.  Planchers de bois franc et salle de bain en ceramique. Logement non chauffe avec entrees laveuse,secheuse.
Tres bien situe et pres des principaux services publics et a quelques minutes de marche d'un centre d'achats.

Pour plus d'information, composer le 
 
 ou visite notre site au www.montreallodging.ca

Located in a Sixplex, this 4 pieces apartment has two closed rooms. Many recent renovations including electricity, doors and windows. Hardwood floors and ceramic bathroom. Unheated, washer , dryer outlet.
Very well located and close to major public services and a few minutes walk from a shopping center.

For more information, call 
 
 or visit our website at www.montreallodging.ca


lintonpromotion

Title: Cession de bail
Description:
Cessation de bail le plus rapidement possible!

Magnifique 4 1/2 entièrement meublé et à proximité du métro Rosemont (12 min en bus) et du métro Plamondon (6 min en bus). Il comprends 2 chambre. 
Chambre 1 : lit queen + lit 1 place
Chambre 2 : lit double
Un salon spacieux idéal pour recevoir.
Une salle de bain.
Une cuisine séparer entièrement fournie : frigo + four + ustensile de cuisine + armoire de rangement.
Le loyer comprend location de l'appartement + eau (chaude et froide) + chauffage = $1000
À votre charge l'électricité (entre $25 et $35 par mois) et l'internet.
Pour plus de renseignement et prise de rdv contacter youcef (
 
) ou Julien (
 
)

Si vous voulez TOUT INCLUS: 1649 et 1769 pour 4 1/ 2 ( 2CAC 2SDB); 1879$/mois pour 5 1/ 2 ( 3CAC 2SDB); * TOUT INCLUS ca veut dire vraiment tout, voir le paragraphe suivant:
Oui, long terme, non meuble et services non-inclus coute beaucoup moins cher que court terme... parce que location court term est un service totalement different et demande un niveau de stress et effort totalement different pour moi. Donc: court terme (+ $$$), meuble (+ $$$), services inclus (+ $$$), WI-FI, TV (+$$$), literie, serviettes, equipment de cuisine (+$$$) et haute saison (+ $$$$ ),

4) PROMO TOUT INCLUS " TOUT HAUTE SAISON " - ~109$/jour*
Contrats « seulement HAUTE saison » = HAUTE prix** (+$$$$). Le filet de saumon n'est pas au meme prix que le saumon entier, n'est pas ca? :) Vous voulez une partie et la meilleure partie :)
Donc, 1*-4 mois de juin a octobre: de 109$/jour. Ceci est un PROMOTION, prix regulier court terme de 150-199$/jour -199+ $ / jour. Fin-semaines/festivals jusqu'a 399/jour!! Bas season - 99$/day , PAS vice-versa! Si vous etes tourists, plus de 31 jours minimum. *1mois peut ne pas etre eligible pour la promo, a discuter.
POUR QUOI C'EST UN PROMO??? 
109$=90+tx /jour, ca paye a peine une chambre d'hotel (ou en effet MOTEL en haute saison!!!). Pour meme prix, en prennat mon condo, vous disposez de 1160-1200pc, 2 chambres a coucher (ou 3, demandez!), deux salles de bains, salon, cuisine etc dans un nouveau bâtiment a 4 km du centre-ville. Alors ...mon condo est en promotion, dans un hotel ca sera le plus garnde APPARTAMENT (HOTEL SUITE) , loue a 350$/jour!!! Et ~ le double en haute saison!!! 
MENTION: ce sont les prix "court terme HAUTE SAISON" PAS les prix "Centre-Ville". Si vous avez vu ce prix dans Centre-ville, (1) ce n'est pas pour cette GRANDEUR/ QUALITE de condo et/ou (2) n'est pas un prix de haute saison et/ou (3) ce n'est pas disponible car il a ete loue 6 -12 mois à l'avance :))) 

CONCLUSION: Idealement appelez 51 quatre. 66ZERO 312DEUX pour details et visite, si pas de reponse immediate, laisez message avec info de base (notez les aussi pour vous), "Code d'annonce" - (commence avec "6", 10 cifres) et repondez a l'annonce, je vais vous recontacter a 100%. SMS seulement avec "Code d'annonce" sinon pas efficace. 

*Exceptions / conditions pourraient appliquer.
(2&3cac - 5 1/2; 2 sdb, 1160-1200pc dispo a H4A0A2 ; aussi 3cac 2sd ~1500pc a partir de 1299/mois - haute de duplex dans h4x1w4 - demandez).

Title: * 4 1/2  - App 608 - 2 CHAMBRES - CHAUFFÉ - T.M.R. 6eme étage*
* 4 1/2 GRAND 950 p.c. CHAUFFÉ, RÉNOVÉ * 5eme étage (avant)
Grand duplex lumineux avec terrasse privée sur le toit - 12/2017
Description:
[ENGLISH FOLLOWS BELOW]

C'est avec regret que nous quittons ce superbe condo chaleureux et plein de cachet de 1000 pc situé à 30 secondes du Parc La Fontaine :

- Moderne, extrêmement lumineux grâce à sa double exposition Est-Ouest, et très bien entretenu, cet appartement est également très fonctionnel avec ses nombreux rangements, et confortable avec un foyer et un système de climatisation.

- Un 1er niveau spacieux avec une belle aire ouverte type loft avec cuisine, salon-salle à manger et balcon.

- Au 2ème niveau: une chambre des maîtres de très belle taille avec balcon, assortie d'un walk-in, une grande salle de bain (avec douche, baignoire et espace buanderie), et un bureau pouvant également faire office de chambre d'enfant ou chambre d'amis (pouvant recevoir un grand lit double d'appoint).

- Sans oublier une superbe terrasse privée sur le toit. Les photos parlent d'elles-mêmes !

- Le condo dispose également d'une place de stationnement et d'une remise extérieure privée pour le rangement des skis, pneus, luges, etc.

- Extrêmement calme (double exposition sur cours).

- Accessibilité : Lignes de bus 24 (Sherbrooke), 45 (Papineau) et 125 (Ontario) à 1-2 minutes de marche, station de métro Papineau accessible à 10 minutes à pieds. Proche du pont Jacques Cartier. Deux stations de Bixi à proximité.

- Prévoir entre 50$ (été) et 80$ (hiver) d'Hydro-Québec. Thermostat bien performant.

- Possibilité d'acheter les électros en parfait état (frigidaire, poêle, lave-vaisselle, laveuse et sécheuse).

Merci de me contacter au 
 
 pour une visite!

====================================

Very nice and huge condo on 2 floors + 1 private rooftop! 30 second from La Fontaine park. 

- modern, very clean and a lot of light thanks to its east/west exposition, a lot of storage, comfy, fireplace and air efficient conditionning. 

- big 1st floor with open area, kitchen, dining & living room, balcony

- 2d floor: big master room with huge walk-in and balcony, huge bathroom, additional room that can be used as bedroom for children (although double bed fits in easily) or office

- great and very spacious rooftop 

- additional storage room where you can store a lot of things (skis, wheels  etc.)

- private parking area included in front of the building!

- very calm 

- very accessible : bus lines 24 (Sherbrooke), 45 (Papineau) et 125 (Ontario) at à 1-2 walking distance, metrop station Papineau at 10 minutes walking distance. Very close to Jacques Cartier bridge, 2  Bixi station available at the corner of the street.

- 50$ to 80$ Hydro-Québec not included.

- Fridge and other appliance in perfect condition can be included as well

Call me on 
 
 for a visit!

Title: Spacious 2 BR corner units from 1200sqft - Peel Metro, luxury building
Description:
Located in the prestigious golden mile in the heart of downtown Montreal.
2 minutes away from Concordia University. 5 minutes from McGill University and the Peel and Guy-Concordia metro stations.



We have a luxurious spacious unfurnished/furnished 1, 2 & 3-bedroom condos available for rent.



1 bedroom unfurnished starts from $1500/month.
1 bedroom fully furnished starts from $2595/month.
2 bedrooms unfurnished starts from $2250/month.
2 bedrooms fully furnished starts from $3495/month.


Rent includes:  Stove, fridge, dishwasher, washer & dryer
Heat/electricity is not included.


The units have central air conditioning and has beautiful granite counters and hardwood flooring. 
Building Amenities include Gym, sauna and rooftop terrace. 
24 hr security surveillance and doorperson. 
Lots of closet space for all your storage needs.


We have an amazing building with the best location in the city. High end boutiques such as Mont Blanc, Christofle, Starbucks coffee and a 24/7 Couche Tard convenience store, Mont Blanc located in our building. All amenities within very close walking proximity.


Please call or text

Title: Downtown 3BR penthouse-Peel metro, 1600sqft +1000sqft balcony
Description:
Located in the prestigious golden mile in the heart of Downtown Montreal. Amazing building with the best location in the city. High end boutiques such as Starbucks coffee, Mont Blanc, Christofle and a 24/7 Couche Tard convenience store located in our building.
We are 2 minutes away from Concordia University, McGill University and the Peel and Guy-Concordia metro stations.
We have a beautiful spacious luxurious penthouse with 3 bedrooms and 2 full washrooms with balcony available as of 1st October. It is an unfurnished unit of over 1600 sqft with 1000sqft plus balcony and an amazing view of the city. 


The apartment is $4750 per month unfurnished.
Rent includes:  Stove, fridge, dishwasher, washer & dryer.
Heat/electricity is not included.


The unit has central air conditioning and has beautiful granite counters and hardwood flooring.
There is 1 full bathroom for each bedroom. You also have a spacious walk-in closet in the master bedroom with the washroom.
Building Amenities include Gym, sauna and rooftop terrace.
24-hour security surveillance with doorperson.
All amenities within very close walking proximity. No hills to climb in the winter for easy access.


Please call or text

Title: Beautiful 4 1/2 in NDG, close to Vendome available now
Description:
Français ci-dessous.

We are looking to rent our beautiful 4 1/2 apartment in NDG.

This apartment is currently available.

Two large bedrooms, one with a door leading to the washroom, both have large closets. A beautiful kitchen with tile floor and backsplash  and a large living room with space for a dining table and couches/tv area. 

All hardwood floors except for the kitchen and bathroom in tile. 

Top floor of the apartment block, this apartment has high ceilings and beautiful big windows that get lots of light. 

Due to a job opportunity that takes us away from Montreal, we need to give up this apartment. We're sad to lose it, it is really a beautiful apartment in a very nice and friendly area, the photos do not do it justice! 

The 105 bus runs directly in front of the building on Sherbrooke and goes straight to Vendome metro on the orange line in about 10 minutes. Or you can walk to Vendome in about 20-25 minutes.

Great restaurants and cafes just in front of the building on Sherbrooke and more about a 15 minute walk on Monkland. A beautiful big park about a ten minute walk away, NDG is a really nice neighborhood with lots of young families. 

Call 
 
 to book a viewing with the superintendent David, he's very nice. 
-------------------------------------

Nous aimerions louer notre bel appartement situé à Notre-Dame de Grâce. Il est disponible maintenent.

Il y a deux grandes chambres dont une connectant à la salle de bain. Les placards sont aussi très grand. La cuisine est très illuminée, avec un plancher de céramique et un doseret surmontant le comptoir. Le salon est grand également avec assez de place pour une table à diner ainsi qu'un divan et télévision.

Les planchers sont en bois franc exepté pour la cuisine et la salle de bain en céramique. Situé au dernier étage du bloc, l'appartement a de hauts plafonds et de grandes fenêtres qui laissent entrer la lumière.

Étant donné une possibilité d'emploi qui nous obligent à quitter Montréal, nous devons laisser tomber l'appartement. Nous sommes tristes de nous en départir, car c'est un appartement extraordinaire dans un quartier magnifique et accueillant. Les photos ne lui rendent pas justice.

La bus 105 passe directement devant l'appartement sur la rue Sherbrooke et se rend jusqu'à la station Vendôme sur la ligne orange en environ 10 minutes ou il est possible de marcher jusqu'à Vendôme en environ 20-25 minutes. Beaucoup de beaux restaurants et petits cafés à quelques minutes à pied sur la rue Sherbrooke et une marche d'environ 15 minutes pour se rendre à Monkland. Un parc immense à environ 10 minutes, NDG est vraiment un quartier accueillant rempli de jeunes familles. 

Appeler 
 
 pour séduler une visite avec le concierge David, il est très gentil.

Title: 7I7AIDE All included doesn't exist!!! ("Huge" Condo)
Description:
7I7AIDE 104EN

- Beautiful and modern 4-plex -- only 3 neighbours 
- Well insulated thermally and acoustically 
- 1160 sf. 
- Recent building (2008) , condos renovated in 2015-2016 
- Huge terazza 100sf (~ 9x12ft ), BBQ possible 
- Residential area minutes from Downtown 
- Big beds in massive wood 
- French Provincial / Victorian/Modern solid wood bedrooms, exquisite furniture 
- 2 complete bathrooms 
- Jacuzzi style tub AND shower in main bathroom and large shower in the otherone 
- 3bdr , queen beds and huge livingroom (can take a 4th student/roommate) 
- 3 km from Loyola Concordia and 4 from the Guy Concordia, - - Concordia suttle passing by. 
- 8min walking to Vandome metro station (or 3 min by bus) 
- 8 min from the Glen Megahospital 
- Park at 100m, 3 utility store in 100m, 3 supermarkets in 400m, 1 km and 1.2 km 
- Ceramic stainless steel stove. 
- Stainless steel fridge and dishwasher 
- Frontal washer dryer in your condo (not in the basement) 

-------------------------------------------- 
Of course you like it 
Does your second choice have all those features? 
My next question is why would you expect to get it at the same price as the one you DON'T like ? 
And second question: would you supplement a bit your initial budget to get something that you like? (could be just 3$ a day)... 
--------------------------------------------- 
Conditions apply 
The main price is nothing included. 
We are open to rent to families, sudents or roomates.
In case of students: Student rental (and not only!) implies different needs that we are all aware: completely furnished or services/utilities included or flexible lease or...all of the above. We are ready and capable to comply with those needs. . . but again, my question is. . . why would you expect all this to be "included" (which in your sub-conscious means "for free")?! 
If you need any added value (furnishing, flexible/shorter lease and some or all services included), it will be done for a price corresponding to the extra effort in administration and costs (and nobody will do it for free- just might make you believe that). 

I am in the market for several years, pls allow me to explain you the myth of "all included": If there are 2 condos of equal price and one owner "offers" the services /utilities included while the other one (greedier- you might think) charge them as extra, the reality is that the first condo/apartment has a lower REGULAR RENTING VALUE -RRV . That would be the condo's renting value empty (unfurnished) and long (aka regular) term -- 1 year (renewable). 
The RRV depends on the quality of the building (thermal and acoustic isolation, etc), age (that might be in connection with the just enumerated factors), location (ex how far from Downtown and what amenities are available around). 
Services/utilities could be presented as "included" but they are not at all free, simply because they are not a un-noticeable value as most people (students especially) think, but 200-700$/month depending on the condo and on the season. A low "all included" rent means that the RRV is even lower , do not think that the owner didn't add some extra cost for furnishing, flexible term and utilities, simply he presented the total as THE MAGIC "all included"!!! And this total is lower because the value of the condo (RRV) is lower. 
Again, what you looking for doesn't exist, services/utilities are 200-700$ a month, nobody would give up this sum to just see a rewarding smile on some students faces. 
So, my condos ARE NOT an average student rental, this ad is addressing to students that would pay a bit more for an exquisite location (4km from Downtown -- Montreal is 50km wide), for above average appliances and , if furnished, for quite exquisite, non-student-type furniture. 
As the quality is over average, I'd hope also for the attention of postgraduates and teachers. 
Thank you for your interest. 
*** Actually this price (1499) is not really for the empty condo, it still includes [over the average quality] appliances as you can see above. "Empty " condos/apartments from CMHC statistics might be with or without appliances but when those appliances are present, in 90% of cases they are only two (2): a white (and maybe old) modest fridge and a white (and maybe old) modest stove. 
My case, again, 5 stainels steel and/or frontal appliances. 

This condo has 3 rooms for 3 students/roommates but can host a group of up to 5-6 or a big family Pls call for more info and visits -  i don't read my emails so often. 
51four 66zero 312two (if no answer, asnwer the ad, thanks).

Located in the heart of the Village, close to Ste Catherine street, close to many commodities (grocery stores, pubs, restaurants...), BIXI station in the courtyard, less than 5 minutes walk from Beaudry metro station (green line).


Lease until February 26th or for one year starting from the date of transfer.
