Title: Comfortable studio  One Bedroom and One Bathroom apartment
Description:
This comfortable studio apartment of 40m² is bright and airy.  Featuring a balcony and free Wi-Fi, the studio is perfect for up to 2 Tenants.  The studio is situated on the 2nd floor and has a double bed and a dining table with chairs. The kitchen is fully equipped with a full-size refrigerator and everything needed to prepare meals in the apartment. The bathroom features a bathtub. 

Tenants will find themselves located in a charming neighbourhood full of shops, restaurants, and cafes. The apartment is also near beautiful, green parks: Parc Lafontaine is just a 15-minute walk away and Parc Sir - Wilfrid -Laurier is less than a 3-minute walk from the studio. 

The living room and kitchen are open concept and the kitchen is equipped with all appliances, cooking utensils and dishes that you 
need. Just fill the fridge with your groceries from the nearby supermarket and you're all set! 

Tenants Access 
The nearest metro station (Laurier Metro, on the orange line) is just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. From here, Montreal City Centre is just 3 stops away.

Title: 3 1/2 (decembre), lumineux / bright, 3e étage / 3rd floor, Plateau
Description:
[English follows]

Unité de coin moderne au 3e et dernier étage dans une rue calme du Plateau Mont-Royal, à deux pas du métro Laurier, offrant une grande chambre et une aire ouverte très lumineuse avec 7 fenêtres dont deux balcons (très rare sur Le Plateau). Appartement loué meublé.

Surface habitable : 68m2 / 737pi2

Emménagement possible à partir du 1er décembre 2017, de préférence pour une durée d'au moins un an.
La peinture aura été refaite, la cuisine remise à neuf, et les électroménagers changés pour des modèles plus modernes (frigidaire, cuisinière et lave-vaisselle).

L'aire ouverte est composée d'une salle à manger, et d'un salon avec foyer. La cuisine américaine, également ouverte, vient encore agrandir cet espace.

Dans la chambre, la fenêtre donne sur les parties communes du bâtiment voisin, et ne pose donc aucun problème de vis-à-vis avec les voisins. Aucun bruit de voisinage.

Dans la salle de bain, un grand puits de lumière rend cette pièce très lumineuse.

Le condo possède aussi une grande buanderie qui offre un espace de rangement supplémentaire (laveuse et sécheuse inclues).

À moins de 10 minutes de marche de :
- Station de métro Laurier
- Parc Laurier
- Supermarchés (Métro, PA, PA Nature)
- petits commerces (boulangerie, fruiterie, boucherie, fromagerie, bio, vêtements, décoration, etc.)
- restaurants (brunch, bagels, sushi, végétarien, et de nombreuses options de cuisines du monde)

Contacter Mikael au 
 
 pour les visites.

--

Furnished modern corner unit located on the third and last floor, in a quiet street of the Plateau, 5 minutes away from the Laurier metro station, with an open area that has 7 windows including 2 balconies (very rare in the Plateau).

Habitable space: 737 sq ft / 68 m2

Move in date: December 1sr 2017, preferably for at least a year.
The apartment will have been repainted, the kitchen refurbished, and the electros changed for modern models (fridge, stove and dish-washer).

The open area is composed of a dining room, and a living room with a fire place. The open kitchen makes this space even larger, making it a spacious and very bright living area. 

In the bedroom, the window faces the common area of the building next door, and there is therefore no vis-à-vis with the neighbours.

The bathroom has a vast light-well, which also makes it a very bright room.

The condo also has a large laundry room with provides very practical extra storing space (washer and dryer included).

Walking distance from:
- Laurier metro station
- Laurier Park
- Supermarkets (Metro, PA, PA Nature)
- Small shops (bakery, fruits and vegetables, butcher shop, cheese shop, organic, clothing, etc.)
- Restaurants (brunch, bagel, sushi, vegetarian, and many world cuisine options) 
Fridge, washer and dryer included.

Call Mikael at 
 
 to schedule a visit.

Title: magnificent 2 bedroom apartment for rent
Description:
DESCRIPTION

Apartment on 1st floor, sleeps 4, renovated, furnished, equipped and decorated with care, unlimited Wi-Fi, 1 bedroom, sofa bed, 2 minutes walk from metro Laurier, free parking on the street. 

Enjoy this magnificent 2 bedroom apartment of 55m2 renovated and fully equipped on the 1st floor of a small building in the heart of the Plateau district. Free parking on the street 

The corner sofa converts to a queen bed so you can sleep 4 comfortably! We also have a park for children so welcome to the family! 

Traveler's access 
The apartment is fully equipped to make you feel at home: 
- Large lounge (40-inch flat screen TV, DVD player, more than 20 movies in English and French available free of charge, French books, tv service, sofa bed for 2 people, 2 closed wardrobes) 
- Fully equipped kitchen (complete crockery, refrigerator, new stove, refrigerator, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle) and cooking and coffee in the morning filter, tea, chocolate, sugar, jam, salt, pepper, spices oil ...) 
- closed bedroom and fully furnished (Sheets, bed 2 queen beds, bedside table and domestic iron) 
- bathroom with bath ( towels provided) 
- Small balcony (table and 2 chairs) 
- Paying laundry in the building ($ 1.50) 
- Non smoking accommodation (smoking allowed on the balcony) 
- Pets allowed 
- Unlimited internet wifi 
- the street 
Everything is at your disposal p or for a pleasant stay! 

The neighborhood 
We lived more than 2 years in this neighborhood which is lively and especially everything is accessible in less than 2 min on foot! 
The apartment is ideally located 10 minutes walk from the Mont Royal street, a shopping street filled with restaurants, 5 minutes from the Mile End and 10 minutes by subway from the city center (Eaton Center, Old Harbor, Chinatown , place des arts ...) 
At the end of the street on the right you are on the street saint Denis and has 2 blocks left on Saint Laurent (bars, discotheque, restaurants)! 
You will be spoiled for choice to choose a restaurant, a bar, a shop or a grocery store. 
At the bottom of the street: 
- opposite the grocery store "Marché Laurier" and a petrol station open 24/24 
- Pharmacy 100m 
- supermarket Metro has 7 min on foot. 
-1 resto to bruncher 150m 
- a bakery 250m ... 
... in short you will be spoiled for choice! 

Transport 
The Laurier metro station (orange line) is a 2minutes walk. In summer there are 3 bixi stations in the vicinity so you can visit Montreal by bike! 

Other remarks 
We do not accept animals

Title: GRAND 4 ½ AU COEUR DU PLATEAU 2 CHAMBRE
Description: Bel et grand appartement, très lumineux meublé : cuisinière, frigo, lave-vaisselle, laveuse-sécheuse (très bon état). 2 chambres fermées, dont l'une dans une pièce double. Situé au 2e étage d'un triplex, tranquille. Convient pour couple ou famille. Voisinage sympathique! Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Look moderne.Appartement de 950 pi2, incluant : 2 chambres fermées, suffisamment grandes pour accommoder un lit king. Plafonds de 9', moulures, planchers de bois fraîchement vernis.Accès à une grande cour verdoyante partagée avec le triplex. La cour s'ouvre sur une ruelle, transformée en ruelle verte cet automne. La campagne en ville!À moins de 5 minutes de marche : épiceries, restaurants, cafés, pharmacie, parcs Lafontaine et Laurier, nettoyeurs, centres de conditionnement physique, métro (Mont-Royal, Laurier) et autobus (97 Mont-Royal, 27 Saint-Joseph, 51 Laurier, 30 St-Denis, 47 Masson).- Cuisine design avec armoires laquées pleine hauteur et comptoir de granit noir. Pièce centrale, pouvant servir de salle à manger ou de salon avec un mur de brique, tout comme dans la salle de bain rénovée.- Stationnement, un grand balcon, un cabanon, un support à vélos.

Title: Lease Transfer-Renovated 41/2! All Appliances! Vendome and VillaMaria!
Description:
Un endroit très charmant et est situé au centre-ville dans un quartier calme et familial. Le quartier est à NDG (coin Sherbrooke et boul. Decarie). Accès facile à l'Autoroute Decarie et la 10 (pour le pont Champlain, Monkland et non loin du quartier Hampstead ou de nombreux cafés, restaurants, épiceries y sont. Sans oublier que les stations de métros Vendôme et Villa Maria sont à proximité moins de 10 min de marche/chaque.

L'arrêt de plusieurs bus 24, 63, ,102, 104, 105 et 138 juste à côté.

C'est un appartement tout neuf (4 1/2) incluant 2 chambres spacieuses, une salle de bain, salle à manger spacieuse et salon (concept : air ouverte). La cuisine est neuve et toute équipée : réfrigérateur, poêle et lave-vaisselle. Sans oublier que laveuse et sécheuse sont également incluses dans l'unité. Pour le stationnement, vous pouvez utiliser public devant l'immeuble. Un autre extra bonus : l'appartement possède deux '2' balcons !!

Vous pouvez nous rejoindre au 
 
. Just pour information que c'est un transfert de bail (le bail se termine le 1er juillet avec une possibilité de renouvellement).

L'appartement sera disponible le 1ier décembre.

A lovely location with a view of St. Lawrence river from your dining table!! A very charming place and is located downtown in a quiet and family friendly area. It's in NDG (corner of Sherbrooke and Decarie Boulevard), Westmount adjacent.

Easy access to Autoroute Decarie, Autoroute 10 (to Champlain bridge), Sherbrooke and Monkland for lots of cafes, restaurants, groceries, etc. Also, right between Vendome and Villa Maria metro stations. Also very close to bus routes 24, 63, 102, 104, 105 and 138 and airport bus at night.

Brand new 2 bedroom apartment (4 1/2) with 2 spacious bedrooms, one bathroom, spacious dining room and living room. Kitchen has fridge, stove, dishwasher included as well. Washer/dryer also included in the unit. There's street parking right in front of the building. Another bonus? 2 balconies!!

Contact us at 
 
 for any other questions or to schedule a visit. We are looking for someone to move in on December 1st,it's a lease transfer that ends on July 1st (with a possibility of extension)

Title: Superbe maison de campagne tout près de la ville
Description:
Située sur l'Île d'Orléans, facile d'accès à tout juste 20 minutes du coeur du centre-ville, endroit calme et lumineux avec vaste terrain sous les arbres, en milieu rural.

- Splendide vue panoramique sur le fleuve et les montagnes, à voir absolument.
- Maison centenaire avec beaucoup de cachet.

- Rez-de-chaussée à aire ouverte, offrant un espace de cuisine et de séjour de style loft, très spacieux et lumineux
- Grand espace bureau dans l'annexe.

Bien isolée, chauffage électrique, et deux poêles à bois (dont une cuisinière antique) pour le plaisir. Vaste garage pour deux voitures. Génératrice électrique installée.

Peut être partiellement meublée au besoin. Disponible rapidement.

Title: Beautiful house for rent in Dorval
Description:
Your private 4 bedroom sanctuary! Victorian style beautiful, charming home only 20 minutes from downtown. In the most desired part of dorval. This single family home is great for entertaining, spacious, updated 4 bedroom (one of which is on the main floor). The bedroom on the main floor can also be used as a large office with a separate entrance. 1 bathroom and 1 powder room, beautiful wrap around porch, down the street from Lakeview! Close to restaurants, grocery stores, bus stop up the road, with private backyard and lots of storage. This property has a very spacious two car garage and driveway large enough to fit a dozen cars. Building is pet friendly with dual energy heating (electric and oil). Safe, family friendly and GREAT sense of community, with baseball diamond, tennis court, kids park, basketball court just across the street and one of the rare areas where there is lake access. Alarm system included. Total of 13,000 square feet of land, "country living" in the city. This property is managed by responsible landlords. Monthly rent for this truly exceptional Victorian home, in a highly sought out area is $2200. Applicants are required to complete a rental application and authorize a $45 credit and background check. Title: 3 1/2 apartment in Lower Plateau available in November
Description:
This is a second-floor, one bedroom (3 1/2) apartment near avenue Parc and avenue Mont-Royal. It is available for rent on November 1st, or possibly a few days earlier. It is available as a lease transfer with an end date of July 1, 2018. This means you are obligated to pay the rent only until July 1st, at which point you are guaranteed the option to renew the lease if you would like to stay longer.

This place has been my home for 6 years during my graduate studies at McGill and I'm only leaving because I am graduating and moving out of town. The location simply cannot be beat, especially for people who are active and enjoy the outdoors:

3 minutes to Provigo
3 minutes to SAQ
4 minutes to Pharmaprix
<1 minute to Parc Jeanne Mance (directly across the street)
5 minutes to start hiking up the mountain
2 minutes to the bus stop for #80 and #55 (can take you to green line), #11, #97 (can take you to orange line)
10 minute walk to Mont-Royal station (orange line)
10 minutes by bus, 20 minute walk to the McGill campus

The apartment offers great value for its size and location. There is a separate living room and kitchen area, an enclosed bedroom, and a small balcony. It offers spacious living for one person or great value for a thrifty couple. The apartment is unfurnished but includes a fridge and stove, and some items (including the bed) are available for purchase to the new tenants. All utilities are included except electricity. There is a coin laundry in the basement.

If you are interested, please send a message with your name and phone number, a little bit about yourself (the more info the better), and your availabilities on weekdays and weekends. I will be in touch shortly. Please note that a credit check will be obtained before signing the lease.

Title: Deluxe fully renovated loft - first time on the market
Description:
One of a kind, 800 sq.ft. (apprx 80 sq.meter) modern and fully renovated loft (with enclosed bathroom), vast kitchen includes five blended appliances (fridge, stove, microwave, cooking surface and dishwasher), 2015 completion, LEDs, concrete floor, radiant heating (hot water circulation in floor), integrated PAX closets for space optimization and small washer/dryer closet with more storage space. Pictures below feature King Sized Bed (for proportions).

Large bathroom with separate deep bath and shower. Glass wall and sliding glass door (providing light and privacy) complete this pristine and modern design. Ideal for one person working at home or a couple working away from home or simply as a pied-à-terre in Montreal. Which is it going to be for you? Basement with lots of light and sunken windows and level entrance. Soundproofed and insulated. Electricity bill (includes heating and hot water) should be around 65$/month (estimate based on previous occupation + Hydro Quebec online tool).

Centrally located in Le Plateau Mont-Royal. All services accessible on foot within 10 minutes or less. Metro entrance (Laurier - orange line) and many bus lines are close, just a 200 meter walk, apprx. Parc Laurier 3 mins, Parc LaFontaine, 10-15 mins walking

If need be, could be fully furnished including washer and dryer (pictured, but not included in base rent), for an additional fee.

Title: Mile End, rénové style condo avec terrasse soleil
Description:
english below...

•	À quelques pas de la montagne, sur une rue tranquille du Mile End
•	Entre Outremont et le Plateau, près de la rue Saint-Viateur et ses cafés et vie urbaine sympathique
•	Près du métro laurier, autobus et bixi, accès rapide vers Centre-ville, l'université McGill et tous les services!
•	Charmante bâtisse en pierre du début du siècle. 
•	Rénovée avec goût, planchers de bois franc, moulures et portes d'origine. 
•	Cuisine Ikea en bois et acier brossé.   
•	Au 3e étage avec balcon avant et grande terrasse coté soleil!
•	Une (1) chambre à coucher, avec beaux espaces dégagés et lumineux. 
•	5 électroménagers inclus : Cuisinière au gaz, micro-ondes, frigo et laveuse-sécheuse. 
•	Très bon rangement avec casier au sous-sol et cabanon pour vélos dans le jardin !

•	Sans fumée et sans animaux

Disponible dès le 1er novembre ou après (flexible)

 
 ext 21


Mile End,  renovated condo style with sunny  terrace

•	Steps away from Mount-Royal park, on a quiet street of Mile End. 
•	Between Outremont and le Plateau, close to St-Viateur street, laidback cafés and artistic venues.
•	Near Laurier metro, buses, bixi. Easy access to McGill university, down-town and all services.
•	Charming early century stone building. Renovated with original hard wood floors, old doors and moldings. 
•	Ikea kitchen with wood and brushed steel cupboards.
•	One ( I ) closed bedroom. Luminous living area. 
•	Third floor with large sunny terrace! 
•	Includes 5 appliances: gaz stove, microwave, refrigerator, washer-dryer. 
•	Excellent storage including basement locker and bike cabana in the garden! 

•	Non smoking and pet free 

•	Available November 1st or later
•	
 
 ext. 21

Title: Luxurious condo next to Dix30 for rent
Description:
Extremely well maintained large condo in Brossard L section, corner unit, very large windows, lots of sunshine, hardwood floors, large open concept kitchen, large balcony, intimate backyard bordered by cedar hedges and private garage with access directly from the condo.
2 outdoor parking spaces. 2 large bedrooms, master bedroom has a large walk-in, 1 spacious bathroom with a podium bathtub and standalone shower. Storage in the basement. Exterior inground pool with heating right next to the private backyard.

Condo building only has 7 units and Condo living area:

- Ground floor over 1500 square feet

- 360 square feet basement including storage and one-car garage

- Private backyard

Facing Lautrec park, no neighbors in either front nor back of the condo building. Minutes' walk to Montreal's Bell Sports Complex and in the heart of the DIX30 district. Close to Dix30 shopping, Adonis, Walmart, restaurants, bars, highway, daycare, park, bicycle path, elementary school, high school and public transportation. Bus 135 is 2 minutes away from the condo and 30 minutes' bus ride to downtown Montreal.

Buses close by: 14, 35, 135, 33

Included: stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, gas fireplace, blinds, wall-mount air conditioner, central vacuum cleaner system, air exchange system, electric garage door opener and alarm system.

Excluded: washer and dryer

Restriction: no smokers and no pets.

Available from Mid-October.

Please text/call or email for more information

Title: NEWLY RENOVATED 1 Bdrm/1 Bath 5 min walk to St. Pete Beach, FL
Description:
Be the first to move into this NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bedroom/ 1 bath apartment 3-minute walk to Upham Beach in St. Petersburg Beach, Florida. 
This apartment is on the side of the multiplex and very private. There's a back gate that has direct access to Blind Pass and Gulf Blvd. where you'll find great restaurants, Corey Ave. market and live entertainment.  Two more blocks and you're at Upham Beach with the most beautiful sunsets and best fishing around.

This is a bright and large (approximately 500 square feet) apartment with new flooring throughout the apartment. The flexible layout has a large living room and sliding doors that opens up to a separate bedroom with a newly renovated bathroom with tiled shower, new toilet and a spacious closet. The new kitchen has brand new cabinets, counter and sink and a pantry with a dining/breakfast area. It's located on the ground floor (no second story) of a multi-unit complex in a nice and quiet residential neighborhood. Coin operated washer/dryer on site. You will have your own designated parking spot.

The US$1100 rent includes electricity, water, sewer, and trash. Happy to share additional pictures as we're completing the final touches of the renovation. Extra storage space available on site for an extra $20/month and ask about furnished option.
First month, $1100 security deposit and 6-month minimum lease required for move in.
Snowbirds, have your own place for half of the year and pay what you would for a 3 month seasonal lease. This is the best rent around as other 1 bdrm/1bth across the street are going for $1400+.  If you live in Tampa and are looking for an inexpensive weekend retreat to the beach, this could be the one for you! (Sorry NO pets and no smokers allowed)

Title: 7AU3HPR 3bdr 2bth w/wo furniture,services NEW building GLEN VENDOME
Description:
7AU3HPR EN (FR en bas) 

DIFFERENT PRICE FOR DIFFERENT SITUATION! PLS CHECK YOUR PRICE DOWN HERE (~599-4600)

DESCRIPTION:
3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms condo, 1200SF, with huge terazza 9x12ft (2 bdr 2 baths condo, 1160sf with JACUZZI also available, ~same prices). New building just 5 minutes from Downtown - H4A 0A2. With Wi-Fi, cable, All ready, all you need. (Nothing included long term available too)
PRIX	
1)	Short term
ALL INCLUDED PROMO "ALL HIGH SEASON":
"HIGH season only" = HIGH prices**. So, June to October, 1*-4 months: PROMO 119$/day (regular=149- 199$/day). If you're a tourist, minimum more than 31 days. (Short term LOW season PROMO 99$/day).
WHY THIS IS A PROMO?
119$/day=99+tx, this hardly pays you a hotel room (a MOTEL Room in high season - I checked some prices). For the same price, taking my condo you'll have 1200sf, 3 bedrooms (or 2), 2 bathrooms, living-room and kitchen in a new building 4 km from Downtown. In a hotel this space would be a Hotel Suite at 350$/day+ :) And ~double in high season!!! 
2) Promo "LOW SEASON MEDIUM TERM" AND "LONG TERM ALL FURNISHED 10-12 Months":
1899$/month for 3bdr 2 bathrooms; 1649 and 1749 for 2bdr 2baths*
3) PROMO " 1 YEAR +" :
Starting now or later: 1299/month and 1399/month for 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms; 1499$/month for 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms. 5 stainless steel/frontal appliances could be included, ask. (Also Upper duplex 3bdr 2 bath in h4x1w3 for 1299, ask)
4) Promo BY ROOM. 499 (nothing included) - 599/month (all included) for a luxury room. Bigger, luxury room with huge terazza 100sf =6494/month. Double room with 2 beds for 2 persons 799 all in (this only in h4x1w4 area - where I have also regular rooms for 599 all in). These are LONG TERM prices, short term not at all or starting form 39$/day/room (min 31 days).
Group of friends/colleagues VERY welcomed.


CONCLUSION 
Ideally call 51four 66zero 312two for more details and visit. If no answer LEAVE MESSAGE with basic info and "Ad ID" (starts with "6", 10 figures) AND answer the ad, I'LL CALL BACK 100%. SMS ONLY with AD id/number. ( not so efficient a first contact). 
MENTIONS: 
There is no reason to compare long term, unfurnished and no utilities price with short term (+$$$), furnished (+$$$), services/utilities included (+$$$), wi-fi, TV and cable (+$$$), linen towels, kitchenware (+$$$) and high season (+$$$$), because is a totally different service (and different level of stress and effort for me). Also, these are short term HIGH SEASON prices NOT "short term high season AND Downtown prices. If you saw this price in Downtown, it's not for this size/quality of condo or is not high season price (or it's not available because it was booked 6-12 months in advance :))) For any comparation, compare all the features, beside the season and the availability.
*Exceptions/ conditions could apply.
** You can get regular price for summer if you bring someone to sign for winter (for the rest of the year).

FR: 
PRIX DIFFERENTS POUR DES SITUATIONS DIFFERENTS : SVP VOIR VOTRE PRIX ICI BAS:(~599-4600)

DESCRIPTION
Condo 2 cac - chambres a coucher - 5 1/2; 2 sdb - sales de bain, 1200pc avec enorme terazza 9x12p! (2cac - 4 1/2; 2 sdb, 1160pc aussi dispo, meme prix) dans battise neuve a 5 min de Centreville - H4A 0A2. Tout pret avec wifi, cable etc. ( rien incluse long terme disponible aussi)

PRIX
1) PROMO TOUT INCLUS " TOUT HAUTE SAISON ":
Contrats « seulement HAUTE saison » = HAUTE prix** -= 149-199+ $ / jour. Promo , 1*-4 mois de juin a octobre: 119/ Jour. Si vous etes tourists, plus de 31 jours minimum. (Bas saison- 99$/jour).
POUR QUOI C'EST PROMO?
119$=99+tx /jour, ca paye a peine une chambre d'hotel (en effet MOTEL car c'est haute saison - j'ai verifie les prix). Pour meme prix, en prennat mon condo, vous disposez de ~1200pc, 3 chambres a coucher (ou 2cac, demandez!), deux salles de bains, salon, cuisine etc dans un nouveau bâtiment a 4 km du centre-ville. Alors ...mon condo est en promotion, dans un hotel ca sera le plus garnde appartement a 350$/jour! Et le double en haute saison!
Bas saison 99 et moins.
2) Promo " MOYEN TERM BAS SAISON" ET "LONG TERM MEUBLE/ TOUT INCLUS 10-12months+":

Title: Two-Bedroom Contemporary Apt! Newly-Renovated with Washer/Dryer!
Description:
This apartment in 725 30e Lachine is newly fitted and refurbished; designed for a contemporary look. Call Emre at 
 
 to set up an appointment and view this property!

Unit amenities: 

Bathroom: All new bathroom installations, tiled finishes for shower (white), and floor (grey), medicine cabinet with mirror installed above toilet.
3 Double closet spaces: Enclosed by mirror slide door in both bedrooms and in the living room - ample storage space.
Kitchen: Kitchen appliances included (fridge, stove, washer/dryer and washing station), white overhead and standing cabinets with a black countertop finish and white tile finish on walls above cabinets. Plenty of cabinet space for storage.
Balcony: Two balconies on the façade of the building accessible from the living room and from one of the bedrooms. 
2 Bedrooms: Unfurnished, plentiful natural light exposure and closet spaces
Living space: Open space with plentiful light exposure

Location Amenities:

Gas Stations: Petro-Canada (750m), Ultramar (1.8km)
Nearby highways: Autoroute du Souvenir
Cycle/Walking Paths: Saint Joseph Boulevard (7 minute cycle, 20 minute walk)
Groceries (<0.6km): Marche New Orchard, Sherbrooke Grocery, Maxi, IGA Extra Vallee, Rachelle-Bery boutique sante

Bars (<0.9km): Brasserie Le Manoire Lachine, Taormina Lounge, Bar Aux Trois Devin

Train: Gare Lachine (2.4km), Station Du Canal (4.9km)
 
Summary:

This apartment has ample natural light in a spacious setting in a convenient location close to all the required amenities for comfortable living. 

Available from January 1st, 2018

Title: GRAND 4 ½ AU COEUR DU PLATEAU 2 CHAMBRE
Description: Bel et grand appartement, très lumineux meublé : cuisinière, frigo, lave-vaisselle, laveuse-sécheuse (très bon état). 2 chambres fermées, dont l'une dans une pièce double. Situé au 2e étage d'un triplex, tranquille. Convient pour couple ou famille. Voisinage sympathique! Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Look moderne.Appartement de 950 pi2, incluant : 2 chambres fermées, suffisamment grandes pour accommoder un lit king. Plafonds de 9', moulures, planchers de bois fraîchement vernis.Accès à une grande cour verdoyante partagée avec le triplex. La cour s'ouvre sur une ruelle, transformée en ruelle verte cet automne. La campagne en ville!À moins de 5 minutes de marche : épiceries, restaurants, cafés, pharmacie, parcs Lafontaine et Laurier, nettoyeurs, centres de conditionnement physique, métro (Mont-Royal, Laurier) et autobus (97 Mont-Royal, 27 Saint-Joseph, 51 Laurier, 30 St-Denis, 47 Masson).- Cuisine design avec armoires laquées pleine hauteur et comptoir de granit noir. Pièce centrale, pouvant servir de salle à manger ou de salon avec un mur de brique, tout comme dans la salle de bain rénovée.- Stationnement, un grand balcon, un cabanon, un support à vélos.

Rent includes:  Stove, fridge, dishwasher, washer & dryer
Heat/electricity is not included. 

The unit has central air conditioning and has beautiful granite counters and hardwood flooring. 

There is 1 full bathroom for each bedroom. You also have a spacious walk-in closet in the master bedroom with the washroom.

24-hour security surveillance with doorperson. 

All amenities within very close walking proximity. No hills to climb in the winter for easy access.

Title: Beautiful Sunny Condo Griffintown/South-West
Description:
Beautiful and cozy furnished condo located on the 2nd floor. The sunny unit includes 1 bedroom, 1 office, 1 bathroom, 2 large balconies, outdoor parking space and a storage room. The condo is perfectly located minutes away from the heart of Griffintown, the Atwater Market, Lachine Canal and steps away from Notre-Dame street's trendy restaurants and nightlife. Canal Lachine takes joggers, cyclists and pedestrians from Atwater Market to the Old Port. Easy public transport access with buses going directly to City Center within minutes, a 7-minute walk to Charlevoix Metro, with nearby access to many highway entries, this is the perfect location whether commuting by foot, bike, car or public transport. 

Rented furnished, semi-furnished or unfurnished. Available as of November 1, 2017 or sooner for long-term rentals.

Title: Apartment perfectly situated between Dr. Penfield & downtown core
Description:
Perfectly situated between Dr. Penfield Street and the core of Downtown Montreal, Belfort Apartments is a wonderful building to live in. Even though it is close proximity to the downtown core (only two blocks away!), you can enjoy a quieter experience by not being directly in the city center. 
All apartment units are large sized and the building is pet friendly. 
And for students looking for a convenient place to live, Belfort Apartments is very close to both Concordia and McGill Universities.
BUILDING AMENITIES:
* All units include fridge, stove, hot water and wood floors
* Most units come with a dishwasher - please inquire
* Building amenities include - security systems, laundry machines in building, video surveillance
* Conveniently located just outside of the core downtown area (right next to the Montreal General Hospital)
* Metro access to Guy-Concordia
* Pet friendly (Cats & Dogs)
* Indoor Garage and Outdoor Parking available (OPTIONAL)
* Storage Lockers available (OPTIONAL)
Bus Routes: 144, 360, 165,166, 66,369,435

Metro Stations: Guy-Concordia, Atwater

Nearby: Concordia University (SGW Campus), Collège de Montréal, Dawson College, Collège LaSalle, Mont Royal (30 min taking 2 buses or a 10 min drive to a Historic, 494-acre park with trails, a lake & incredible views of the city) Hôpital Général De Montréal (The Montreal General Hospital), Club Atwater (fitness facility, student rates available) and The Sacred Heart School of Montreal.

Public Transit: includes Bus Routes 66, 144, 165, 166, 360, 369, and 435. The
closest Metro/Subway Stations are Guy-Concordia and Atwater (Green Line).
Close to Avenue du Docteur-Penfield.

Attractions: This building is close enough to the action of the downtown core,
without the hustle, bustle and noises inherent to a downtown core. College and
University students can easily make their way to Concordia University (SGW
Campus), Collège de Montréal, Dawson College, Collège LaSalle, and McGill
University. The building is also close to The Sacred Heart School of Montreal (a
private all girls English Catholic High School). Other attractions include being next
to the Hôpital Général De Montréal (The Montreal General Hospital), and Club
Atwater (fitness facility, student rates available). Finally nature-loving residents
can enjoy one of Montreal's most popular attractions: Mont Royal (30 min taking
2 buses or a 10 min drive to a Historic, 494-acre park with trails, a lake and
incredible views of the city).
By Appointment Only - To book a visit for Belfort Apartments and find out about this week's special promotion, please call Sonny @

.

Title: Old Mtl, ground floor, industrial look, 1 bed apt, 1000sf+
Description:
Located in the heart of Montreal Old Port, this beautiful 1 BR apartment industrial looking! Concrete floors, exposed beams and brick/stone walls, give it all the edge and vibe of Montreal Old port.
Features: 1000 sq.ft. big bedroom, massive kitchen island with quartz counter top. Lots of storage.

References required, credit verification+ tenant insurance with 2 million liability coverage, no pets, no smoking.

Must see!
--------------------------------
Situé au coeur du Vieux-Port de Montréal, ce joli apartement 1 CAC unique, spacieux et look industriel!! Cet planchers de béton, poutres et mur de pierre/brique exposés lui donne tout le style et l'ambiance du Vieux-Port de Montréal.
Caractéristique: 1000 sq.ft. grande CAC, ilot de cuisine massive avec comptoir en quartz. Beaucoup de rangement.

Références requises, enquête de crédit, assurance locataire (2 millions de responsabilité civile) pas d'animaux et non fumeur.

Title: Beautiful & spacious lower duplex TMR/Ville Mont-Royal
Description:
Inclusions: tous les électros (frigo, four, lave-vaisselle, micro-onde, laveuse/sécheuse), chauffage, un espace de stationnement extérieur, un espace de stationnement dans le garage, déneigement de l'allée en avant de la propriété et du stationnement, taxe d'eau 

Bas de duplex de 3 chambres à coucher qui a été très bien entretenu au fil des ans. Plusieurs rénovations lui ont donné un look au goût du jour tout en ayant préservé son cachet d'origine. La cuisine est rénovée et on y retrouve un petit coin repas avec un ilot central ainsi qu'un four au gaz. La salle à manger est adjacente à la cuisine et peut très bien servir de salon. De par la salle à manger, vous avez accès au grand balcon qui donne sur la façade arrière de l'immeuble. Les chambres à coucher sont toutes de bonne taille. Cette propriété a 2 salles de bain complètes dont une au rez-de-chaussée et une au sous-sol. Au sous-sol, vous avez une salle familiale spacieuse et un accès direct au garage (espace de rangement disponible). Vous bénéficierez d'un espace de garage intérieur et un espace additionnel de stationnement extérieur.

Pour les professionnels qui travaillent au Centre-Ville de Montréal, ou pour les étudiants qui utilisent le transport en commun, l'autobus 165 est au coin de la rue et vous emmène au métro Côte-des-Neiges et Guy-Concordia. Ceux qui préfèrent le train pourront aussi se rendre à la gare Mont-Royal qui est directement en face du logement (7 minutes seulement jusqu'au Centre-Ville). Avec le temps froid à nos portes, vous pourrez profiter de la patinoire extérieure située au Centre récréatif de Ville Mont-Royal (5 minutes de marche). L'été, ce sera plutôt son immense terrain de soccer ainsi que la piscine qui vous gardera en forme!

Title: Location Meuble à Trois Chambres -À PIEDS DU METRO CHARLEVOIX
Description:
DISPONIBLE LE 1ER Octobre

Cet appartement se situe dans le district de Pointe-Saint-Charles, à proximité du Marché Atwater et du Canal Lachine. Il à trois chambres.L'appartement a deux balcons, un en avant et lautre en arrière, ainsi qu'une entrée privée. Certains murs de l'appartement sont en brique, due à la construction originale du bâtiment en 1900. Lépicerie se situe à 2 coins de rues et le métro est à peine à 5 coins de rues du pas de la porte. Vous êtes à maximum 15 minutes du fameux Centre-ville de Montréal!

Inclus dans le loyer est:

-Tous les meubles
-Internet sans fil
-Télévision
-Chauffage
-Eau chaude
-Électricité
-Serviettes et draps
-Cuisine entièrement équipée
-Laveuse/secheuse dans l'appartement
-Grand Balcon Privé

___________________________________________________________________________________

AVAILABLE October 1ST

2 bedroom plus office that could be used as a third bedroom

This apartment is located in the Pointe-Saint-Charles district, close to the Atwater Market and the Lachine Canal. It is better suited as a two bedroom with an office space, but can be used as a small three bedroom. The apartment has two balconies, one forward and the other back, as well as a private entrance. Some walls of the apartment are brick, due to the original construction of the building in 1900. The grocery store is located at 2 street corners and the metro is barely 5 blocks from the doorstep. You are at maximum 15 minutes of the famous Downtown Montreal!

Included in the rent is:

-All furniture
-Wireless Internet
-Television
-Heating
-Hot water
-Electricity
-Bedding and towels
-Fully equipped kitchen
-Washer / dryer in the apartment
-Grand Private Balcony

Title: HUGE + BRIGHT 41/2 + 3 mo FREE indoor parking avail NOW
Description:
Hi!
I got accepted to a school in BC and need to sublet my apartment asap.
Love this place. It's massive, soundproof and has tons of sunlight. 2 bedrooms, kitchen, living room, dining room. 3 months FREE indoor parking with lease takeover. Indoor/outdoor parking available. Great, quiet neighbourhood. On the corner are the bus stops; 102, 103, 162, 262, 420.

IGA, SAQ, coffee shops, dry cleaning, BMO, McDonalds less than 5 minute walk away. 
It's a family friendly neighbourhood. Lot's of  play parks. 
5 minute drive from Montreal west village strip. Tons of restos, cafes, banks, grocery stores, etc.
Pet friendly building! :)

Building has indoor pool, gym + sauna INCLUDED in rent ($1050).
Hydro is not included. My bill averaged $35 every 2 months.

All new furniture for sale if needed!! :) 

Thanks!

Title: TMR (Ville Mont-Royal) Appartement à louer! Avec garage!
Description:
Available November or December 1st.

Huge 4 1/2, located in TMR on Graham blvd, sunny and extremely peaceful. 

Included: fridge, stove, heating, water, storage locker, garage spot.

High quality building, laundry on the ground floor.

7 minute walk to Acadie metro (blue line).

9 minute drive to the Autoroute 15.

5 minute drive to Rockland Center and 10 minute drive to Marché Central (various stores, restaurants, Costco, etc.)

Small animals accepted.

The tenant is unfortunately scheduled to undergo surgery in December and will not be working for the next 6 months, so she's moving into a smaller space.


Disponible le 1er novembre ou le 1er décembre.

Immense 4 1/2 situé à Ville Mont-Royal. L'appartement est très ensoleillé et le cartier est super calme.

Inclus: frigo, poêle, chauffage, eau chaude, entreposage, une place dans le garage. 

Un buanderie est à votre disposition au red-de-chaussé. 

7 minutes de marche à la station de métro Acadie (ligne bleue).

9 minutes en voiture jusqu'à Décarie (autoroute 15).

5 minutes en voiture au centre Rockland et 10 minutes au Marché Central (magasins, restos, Costco, etc.)

Petits animaux sont acceptés.

La locataire veut malheureusement quitter l'appartement et déménager dans un logement plus petit et au coût plus bas, car elle devra prendre un congé de maladie de 6 mois.

Title: 3br Spacious 6 1/2 in Ville Emard next to Parc Garneau (Oct 1)
Description:
Charming apartment for rent with semi-finished basement and mud/storage room in lower 2-floor triplex on Parc Garneau street (cross Monk and Briand)
- 2 closed bedrooms and one living room (possible bedroom conversion), dining room/living room, kitchen including stove and fridge, 1 1/2 bathroom, washer and dryer included
- Rear veranda with small enclosed backyard space, front veranda looking at one block Parc-Garneau which has small events in the summer organised by Arrondissement Sud-Ouest. Recently repainted interior.
- Very well located: 2 blocks walking distance to Monk metro (Green Line); adjacent to Bus # 36 ending at Place Saint-Henri (Orange Line); close proximity to Jolicoeur metro. Close proximity to grocery stores, banks, gym, library (Marie Uguay), cafes, pharmacy, entertainment (Paradoxe Theatre) etc. Near the new MUHC, Lachine canal, Wellington and Notre-Dame commercial streets, Angrignon Park, Atwater market in same Sud-Ouest neighbourhood.
- $1550/month. Utilities not included. Available Oct 1st (or earlier) move in. 
- Viewing available by appointment.



Appartement à louer à partir du 1er aout 2017 ou avant. 2 Grande chambre double. Troisième chambre peut être salon ou chambre à coucher (grandes portes double); salle aà manger/salon; cuisine incluant poele et frigo; sous-sol partièllement fini.
-Très bien situé: 2 bloques du métro Monk (ligne verte); À côté du bus n ° 36 se terminant à la place Saint-Henri (ligne orange); À proximité du métro Jolicoeur. Proche du nouveau CUSM, du canal Lachine, des rues commerçantes de Wellington et Notre-Dame, du parc Angrignon, du marché Atwater, des cafés et boutiques indeépendentes, des pharmacies Proxim et Jean Coutu, des divertissements (Théâtre Paradoxe). Quartier Sud-Ouest.
- Véranda arrière avec petit espace clos, véranda donnant sur le Parc Garneau qui a des petits événements organisés en été par l'Arrondissement Sud-Ouest. Intérieur récemment repeint.
-Beaucoup de lumière dans la cuisine. 
- 1550 $ / mois. Électricité et chauffage ne sont pas inclus. Disponible le 1er octobre (ou plus tôt).
- Visite disponible sur rendez-vous.

Title: Apartment - 2 1/2 - Montréal
LARGE, SUNNY AND RENOVATED + GARAGE
Description:
Large and sunny apartments in a detached stone building of 3 apartments. Located in Cote des Neiges / Notre Dame de Grace (CDN / NDG) in the district of Snowdon. Walking distance to everything. Completely renovated this year (2017). One way street with mature trees. Residential area. Very bright. Master bedroom with private bathroom + large closet + garage. 

Appartment 1: 8-1/2. Large and sunny. Second floor. 4 closed bedrooms + 2 bathrooms + large living room + dining room + kitchen + Private parking + garage + 2 outdoor terraces + Air conditioner + Lots of storage space.  Washer / dryer. High ceilings. ~2000 square feet (185 square meters). 2800$ per month.

Appartment 2: 7-1/2. Large and sunny. Ground floor. 3 closed bedrooms + 2 bathrooms + large living room + dining room + kitchen + Private parking + garage + 1 large outdoor terrace + Access to a private yard + Air conditioner + Lots of storage space. Washer / dryer. High ceilings. ~1850 square feet (170 square meters). 3000$ per month.

A. Characteristics
THE APPARTMENT HAS BEEN COMPLETELY RENOVATED WHILE RETAINING ITS ORIGINAL STAMP.
• MASTER BEDROOM WITH PRIVATE BATHROOM AND LARGE CLOSET 
• OPEN SPACE DINING ROOM + KITCHEN
 • NEW KITCHEN WITH ISLAND AND QUARTZ COUNTER TOPS.
 • NEW BATHROOMS.
 • ELECTRICITY AND PLUMBING COMPLETELY REDONE
 • INDEPENDANT HEATING PER ROOM
 • HARWOOD FLOORS SANDED AND VARNISHED.
 • NEW WALLS AND FLOORS MADE OF PORCELAIN
 • NEW WINDOWS
 • WOODEN FRAMES, BASEBOARDS AND DOORS
 • NEW PAINT
 • NEW AIR CONDITIONER

 B. Location
 WALKING DISTANCE TO EVERYTHING: WALKSCORE = 93/100
 • 5 minutes walking distance to the Snowdon metro station (orange line & blue line)
 • 9 minutes walking distance to the Côte Sainte Catherine metro station (orange line )
 • 15 minutes walking distance to the Côte des neiges metro station (blue line)
 • Bus Line: 17, 51, 124, 129, 166, 368
 • 2 minutes access to Highway 15
 • 10-15 minutes access to airport by car
 • Quick access to downtown
 • Parcs, shops and services : grocery stores, fruits and vegetables markets, pharmacies, restaurants, library, bookstores,  daycare, CPE, banks, Dollarama and other stores
 • Gym: YMHA / YWHA, CEPSUM, etc.
 • Hospitals: St. Mary's Hospital, Jewish General, Sainte-Justine Hospital General, MUHC, etc.
 • Universities: University of Montreal, HEC, Polytechnique, etc.
 • Colleges: College Notre Dame, Brébeuf, Boarding School, Villa Maria, Marcellines, Marie de France, Royal Vale etc.
 • Several public, private and international schools: International primary school, primary school Marie de France, etc.
 • Others: Saint Joseph Oratory, Queen Mary, Chemin Côte des neiges, Côte Sainte- Catherine, Victoria


 C. Inclusions
 • Lights, air conditioner, snow removal, landscaping, garage
 • Possibility to include 5 new home appliances: fridge, stove, dishwasher, washer and dryer for 150$ per month

Title: Appartement 3 1/2 sur le Plateau-Mont-Royal
Description:
Charmant appartement semi-meublé situé à l'angle des rues Henri-Julien et Duluth dans le quartier portugais du Plateau-Mont-Royal. Sous-location du 15 octobre 2017 au 31 juin 2018 avec possibilité de renouveler le bail en juillet 2018.

-1 grande chambre fermée
-1 salon fermé
-1 cuisine / salle à manger
-1 balcon avant
-1 balcon arrière couvert
-Accès à la cour arrière avec grands arbres
-1 remise d'entreposage
-Baignoire sur pieds fraîchement émaillée
-Évier de cuisine de type cuve double fraîchement émaillé
-Armoires de cuisines d'origine avec verrerie
-Plancher de bois (salon, chambre cuisine) et tuile (salle de bain)
-Grande garde-robe de type "walk-in" avec éclairage
-Cuisinière au gaz et réfrigérateur inclus
-Grandes fenêtres dans toutes les pièces
-Puis de lumière dans la salle de bain
-Portes et boiseries d'origine
-Situé au 2ème étage d'un triplex

Title: LARGE ENSOLEILLÉ ET RÉNOVÉ + GARAGE
Description:
Appartements spacieux et ensoleillé dans un immeuble en pierre détaché de 3 appartements. Situé dans Côte des Neiges / Notre Dame de Grace (CDN / NDG) dans le district de Snowdon. A distance de marche de tout. Entièrement rénové cette année (2017). Rue à sens unique avec des arbres matures. Zone résidentielle. Chambre des maîtres avec salle de bain privée + grand garde-robe +garage. 

Appartement 1: 8-1 / 2. Large et ensoleillé. Deuxième étage. 4 chambres fermées + 2 salles de bains + grand salon + salle à manger + cuisine + parking privé + garage +2 terrasses extérieures + air conditionné + beaucoup d'espace de rangement. Laveuse / sécheuse. Hauts plafonds. 185 mètres carrés (environ 2000 pieds carrés). 2800$ par mois.

Appartement 2: 7-1 / 2. Large et ensoleillé. Rez-de-chaussée. 3 chambres fermées + 2 salles de bains + grand salon + salle à manger + cuisine + parking privé + garage + 1 grande terrasse extérieure + accès à une cour privée + air conditionné + beaucoup d'espace de rangement. Laveuse / sécheuse. Hauts plafonds. 170 mètres carrés (environ 1850 pieds carrés). 3000$ par mois.

A. Caractéristiques
LES APPARTEMENTS ONT ÉTÉ ENTIÈREMENT RÉNOVÉ TOUT EN PRÉSERVANT LE CACHET ORIGINAL. 
• CHAMBRE DES MAITRES AVEC SALLE DE BAIN PRIVÉE ET GRAND GARDE-ROBE
• ESPACE OUVERT SALLE A MANGER + CUISINE
 • NOUVELLES CUISINES AVEC ILÔT ET COMPTOIR EN QUARTZ.
 • NOUVELLES SALLES DE BAINS
 • ÉLECTRICITÉ ET PLOMBERIE REFAITS À NEUF
 • CHAUFFAGE INDÉPENDANT PAR PIÈCE
 • PLANCHERS SABLÉS ET VERNIS.

 • NOUVELLES FENÊTRES
 • CADRES, PORTES ET MOULURES EN BOIS
 • NOUVELLE PEINTURE
 • NOUVEAU CLIMATISEUR

 B. Emplacement
 ÀDISTANCE DE MARCHE À TOUT: WALKSCORE = 93/100
 • 5 minutes à pied de la station de métro Snowdon (ligne orange et ligne bleue)
 • 9 minutes à pied de la station de métro Côte Sainte Catherine (ligne orange)
 • 15 minutes à pied de la station de métro Côte des neiges (ligne bleue)

Title: Heart of Old Montreal & Near Metro! Charming 4 ½ for Rent Furnished!
Description:
446 St-Louis

Completely renovated in 2012, using high-quality materials! This beautiful spacious apartment is located on the ground floor of a heritage type, five units building located on a quiet street in Old Montreal. It features 2 beautiful large bedrooms. Furnished with taste and quality, it has a superb spacious living room adjacent to the dining area. The functional kitchen overlooks the backyard. The use of the backyard is exclusive to the apartment. You will love the beautiful modern bathroom with washer/dryer and the beautiful exotic hardwood floors.

Building located in the Old Montreal at 2 minutes walk from the Champs-de-Mars metro station. Fast access to the 720 freeway and the East of Montreal via the Notre-Dame Street. At proximity of many Old Montreal green spaces, the cycling path, many restaurants, the Jacques-Cartier Place and minutes from all downtown Montreal services.

Fully furnished and equipped; heat, electricity, stove, fridge, dishwasher, washer, dryer, microwave, high-speed internet, basic cable, DVD, television, stereo, fully equipped kitchen, linens, phone included (local calls only), hardwood floors and backyard. Possibility for INDOOR parking for extra (200$/month).


Conditions:
Minimum 12 months rental.
Non-smoking.
No pets.

INDOOR Parking available for extra (200$/ per month).


 


Or visit www.rentalmontreal.com for more options!

Title: GRAND 4 ½ AU COEUR DU PLATEAU 2 CHAMBRE
Description:
Bel et grand appartement, très lumineux meublé : cuisinière, frigo, lave-vaisselle, laveuse-sécheuse (très bon état). 2 chambres fermées, dont l'une dans une pièce double. Situé au 2e étage d'un triplex, tranquille. Convient pour couple ou famille. Voisinage sympathique! Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Look moderne.Appartement de 950 pi2, incluant : 2 chambres fermées, suffisamment grandes pour accommoder un lit king. Plafonds de 9', moulures, planchers de bois fraîchement vernis.Accès à une grande cour verdoyante partagée avec le triplex. La cour s'ouvre sur une ruelle, transformée en ruelle verte cet automne. La campagne en ville!
À moins de 5 minutes de marche : épiceries, restaurants, cafés, pharmacie, parcs Lafontaine et Laurier, nettoyeurs, centres de conditionnement physique, métro (Mont-Royal, Laurier) et autobus (97 Mont-Royal, 27 Saint-Joseph, 51 Laurier, 30 St-Denis, 47 Masson).- Cuisine design avec armoires laquées pleine hauteur et comptoir de granit noir. Pièce centrale, pouvant servir de salle à manger ou de salon avec un mur de brique, tout comme dans la salle de bain rénovée.- Stationnement, un grand balcon, un cabanon, un support à vélos.

Title: Bel et grand appartement sur le plateau
Description:
Bonjour,

je cède mon bail pour le 1er novembre. Il s'agit d'un très grand et bel appartement sur Saint Denis, croisement Marie-Anne. 4 chambres (dont une double, très grande et une petite avec grand dressing), une buanderie, une salle de bain, grande cuisine ouverte sur grand salon, mur en brique, une grande terrasse. Aucun problème de voisinage, malgré quelques grosses soirées. 4 minutes à pied du métro Mont royal. Restaurants, épiceries, bars, boutiques dans la rue. Non meublé et sans charges, mais je peux vous revendre quelques meubles.
Faites-moi signe pour une visite !

Merci

Title: FRESHLY RENOVATED! Big Bright 6 1/2 with 2 balconies & central air
Description:
In the heart of ST-Henri  this is a second floor duplex that is facing a park with also a back balcony overlooking a large yard.
The house was just renovated, we redid every room and put in a brand new bathroom and kitchen.  There are 3 bedrooms with a living room, kitchen, dinning room, washer dryer area, front and back balcony with possibility of using the large backyard.
The house has brand new baseboards and central air condition and heating that is controlled by you.  I am the owner of the house i live downstairs, i run a drone racing league and school and very laid back and usually busy out of the house working or running events.  im looking for responsible people who pay their rent with post dated checks and who are clean and respectful.    I am happy to provide skype tours or you can come and visit the place with an appointment.  please email only. thanks nick

The house is close to everything.

Park and outdoor gym = across the street.
the Canal = 1 min walk
the st ambroise brewery = 5 min
bar de courcelle  = 5 min
adamo pizza = 5 min
campanelli coffee = 5min
park with pool and tennis courts = 5 min same street.
St-henri metro = 9 min walk 
IGA = 12 min

you are 2 block from notre dame and in the most up and coming neighborhood.

Title: Downtown Montreal luxury 2 bedroom condo
Description:
9th floor 2 bedroom condo with incredible views 1 min. walk to St-Catherine street, accross the street from Place Ville Marie. Included are Fridge, stove, washer dryer, micro wave and dishwasher. The floors are hardwood, granite tops, large shower and private balcony. We have 24 hour doorman in the lobby, heated pool, gym in the building. Available as of Sept. 1st. References are required, no dogs permitted and prefer non smoker. An interior garage is available but not included in the rent. For info or showing requests call Frank Di Loreto 
 
, broker.

Title: 4-1/2 SPARKLING ULTRA-MODERN - PLATEAU MONT-ROYAL - OCT./NOV. 2017
Description:
Condo style apartments at Château Duluth (www.chateau8.com), 857 Duluth Est., Plateau Mont-Royal, Montréal, sparkling clean apartment available for October or November, 2017. 

Bright 4-1/2 rooms, 2nd floor apartment, ultra-modern, energy efficient, 2 closed bedrooms, open kitchen and livingroom design, with ceramic and hardwood oak flooring. All rooms have large thermal hybrid windows facing southward sunlight. Apartments are wired with comfort controls for soft heating and ultra-quiet central cooling, internet access, alarm system, central security fire monitoring, and access to 4 satellite dishes. Two roof-top terraces provide a panoramic view of the downtown skyline and mountain. 

Optionally for a small fee ($50/month) 5 large appliances can be provided: stainless-steel fridge, stove, & dishwasher, along with a washer & dryer. 

CATS = OK

Title: 3 1/2 apt with beautiful view- near McGill (starting Nov. 1)
Description:
Lease transfer or sublet for a nice 3 1/2 apartment at the 11th floor in a renovated building: gorgeous view of the city and the royal mountain at the big balcony, five minutes' walk to McGill. The price includes hot water, heating, and electricity. Laundry room is at the basement of the building. It's five minutes' walk to McGill metro station, and five minutes' walk to the McGill gym. The Metro and Provigo Grocery stores are ten minutes' walk. 
You can use the existing wifi by paying an extra fee of $35 for unlimited use, or you can contact the cable company to set up your own.
Available from November 1st, 2017.

Title: FOR RENT BEAUTIFUL HOUSE COTE ST LUC ADJ HAMPSTEAD
Description:
Superbement située dans un quartier calme et tres recherché de cote st luc adjacent Hampstead ! Cette magnifique maison vous offre 5 chambres à coucher a l'étage (dont une master bedroom avec son dressing walk-in et sa salle de bain), 4 salles de bains et 1 salle d'eau au rez de chaussee. Elle dispose d'une cuisine spacieuse, de superbes plancher en bois, de hauts plafonds et bien plus encore. Vous disposez en plus d'un sauna, d'une belle terrasse avec jardin privatif,d'un garage double et d'une piscine intérieur. C'est un produit exceptionnel a visiter absolument!
Superbly located in a quiet and very sought after cote st luc adjacent Hampstead! This beautiful house offers 5 bedrooms upstairs (including a master bedroom with its walk-in closet and bathroom), 4 bathrooms and 1 bathroom on the ground floor. It has a spacious kitchen, stunning wooden floors, high ceilings and much more. In addition, there is a sauna, a beautiful terrace with a private garden, a double garage and an indoor swimming pool. It is an exceptional product to visit absolutely!

Title: January 1st: fully furnished 5 1/2 facing park, metro Jolicoeur
Description:
Fully furnished apartment. Rent includes heat, electricity, hot water, unlimited high speed internet (wifi).

Great location for easy access to downtown as well as to the superhospital. Minutes to the metro on foot, bixi bike station steps away. The unit comes-fully equipped with everything you need. Just bring your suitcase and your own linens!

Perfect for university students and professionals---large furnished 5 1/2 (1000 sq. ft.) with balconies front and back. Located on the 2nd floor of a triplex facing a gorgeous tree-lined park. Bright and airy, high ceilings, 3 bedrooms, living room, large fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher, fridge, stove, washer, and dryer!! Never leave the house to do your laundry!! Microwave, toaster, kettle, etc., and all dishes, glassware, pots, pans, cutlery etc. included.

Excellent location if by car or by foot: 5 min to Jolicoeur metro (located on the green line--8 min to Concordia, 10 min to McGill) and on-ramp to highway located 3 min away by car (it is 5 minutes to downtown by car).

5 min walk to Provigo and other amenities.
Bixi bike station on the corner of the park just a few steps away (2 minute bike ride to the metro--there's a bixi station there too!).
New tennis courts and soccer field next to metro.
Lots of parking on the street.
No pets, no smoking.

$1950/month, lease starting January 1st, 2018 for a minimum of 4 months

Title: 1 furnished apartment for rent
Description:
DESCRIPTION
 
A cozy house only 10 minutes from downtown Montreal. Duplex for rent, 5 1/2 on the second floor. Very strategic location. It takes only 15 ... 20 minutes to the Montreal center by bus or 10 minutes by car. And only 10 minutes from Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport. 

Nearby: arena, public swimming pool, library, park, cycle path, Lachine canal, restaurants. Close access to bus service and 10 minute walk to the train. Quick access to highway 20 , 13 and 15. I love to run. Usually I run along the Lachine Canal to the center of Montreal ( 10 kilometers) or to the Park Rene Levesque or even to Dorval enjoying the magnificent beauty of the nature. We also often go for a walk along the canal de Lachine all the family to the center of Montreal. We made all (or almost all) to make you feel at home...

House rules
We respect the tranquility of our neighbors. We hope that you also will respect them. We do not welcome parties and noise. We welcome travelers who came to see our wonderful city. We are open to dialogue. And we will be glad if you will feel like at home. 

We can provide free parking for one car (for the second car you will have to pay $ 10 a day or you can park on the street in font of the house). Cleaning fee added to final price.

Title: Gorgeous 3 bed 2bth Apartment Available Immediately!
Description:
Looking for a bit more space than the average apartment? Then you've found it! 

This is a bright, lovely 3 bedroom apartment with 2 baths (1 is a master bath with a whirlpool tub). 

There are separate living and family rooms, as well as a dining room and a kitchen. Five appliances are included in the kitchen.

As a bonus, there is a storage room in the basement for all of your extra belongings!

The rent is $2,800 with heat included.

No smokers please!

Title: EXCEPTIONAL,SPECTACULAR,BRIGHT RENOVATED LARGE 4 1/2 VERDUN
Description:
La description en française suit en dessous de l'anglais:

4 ½-room apartment for rent in Verdun, 3 minutes walk from the Bannantyne Bus and close to Jolicoeur metro station. Available October 1, this is a great opportunity for a single professional or young couple that is looking for a large spacious apartment renovated with new kitchen.

 The apartment is very bright and is located on the second floor of a four plex.
2 closed bedrooms and 2 balconies. front and back
Brand new Washer / dryer included and has plenty of storage space. 
Lots of parking on the street. 

Grocery stores, restaurants and other shops and services within walking distance. 

The neighborhood is quiet, has many parks and is close to the Canal de l'Aqueduc and the river. Ideal for making beautiful walks or cycling. 

Perfect apartment for a single person or a couple. A credit investigation will be carried out by the owner.

La description

Appartement de 4 ½ pièces à louer à Verdun, à 3 minutes à pied du bus 108(Bannantyne) 5 minutes du bus 112(Beurling) et à proximité de la station de métro Jolicoeur. Disponible le 1er octobre, c'est une excellente opportunité pour un professionnel ou un jeune couple qui cherche un grand appartement spacieux rénové avec une nouvelle cuisine.

L'appartement est très lumineux et se trouve au deuxième étage d'un quadruplex.
2 chambres fermées et 2 balcons, en avant et en arrière
Nouvelles laveuse et sécheuse incluses. Beaucoup de rangement.
Beaucoup de places stationnement sur la rue.
Des épiceries, des restaurants et d'autres commerces et services à courte distance de marche.

Le quartier est calme, a de nombreux parcs et se trouve à proximité du Canal de l'Aqueduc et du fleuve. Idéal pour faire de belles promenades ou faire du vélo

Title: GRAND 4 ½ AU COEUR DU PLATEAU 2 CHAMBRE
Description:
Bel et grand appartement, très lumineux meublé : cuisinière, frigo, lave-vaisselle, laveuse-sécheuse (très bon état). 2 chambres fermées, dont l'une dans une pièce double. Situé au 2e étage d'un triplex, tranquille. Convient pour couple ou famille. Voisinage sympathique! Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Look moderne.Appartement de 950 pi2, incluant : 2 chambres fermées, suffisamment grandes pour accommoder un lit king. Plafonds de 9', moulures, planchers de bois fraîchement vernis.Accès à une grande cour verdoyante partagée avec le triplex. La cour s'ouvre sur une ruelle, transformée en ruelle verte cet automne. La campagne en ville!
À moins de 5 minutes de marche : épiceries, restaurants, cafés, pharmacie, parcs Lafontaine et Laurier, nettoyeurs, centres de conditionnement physique, métro (Mont-Royal, Laurier) et autobus (97 Mont-Royal, 27 Saint-Joseph, 51 Laurier, 30 St-Denis, 47 Masson).- Cuisine design avec armoires laquées pleine hauteur et comptoir de granit noir. Pièce centrale, pouvant servir de salle à manger ou de salon avec un mur de brique, tout comme dans la salle de bain rénovée.- Stationnement, un grand balcon, un cabanon, un support à vélos.

Title: 5 1/2 $990 lease transfer point st charles
Description:
We are looking to lease transfer our cozy 5 1/2 apartment in Point st Charles for Nov. 1st until Jun 1st with opportunity to extend. Its a comfortable 3 bedroom with old cherry wood floors, and arched entryways into the main spaces. The kitchen is spacious and comes with stove and fridge. There's washer/dryer hookups available in kitchen as well (stackable preferred- close to balcony entrance). Just off the kitchen there is a private balcony. The three bedrooms vary in size, but all have their own charm.There is a clawfoot tub in the bathroom. Its an older style . apartment with a lot of charm. Cats allowed-could inquire about small dog. Honestly it's such a deal for everything it is. Check out the photos, come check out the place! Don't hesitate to ask any questions!
Super afordable for students or even a small family. 
HydrI not incl
References required.

Title: GRAND 4 ½ AU COEUR DU PLATEAU 2 CHAMBRE
Description:
Bel et grand appartement, très lumineux meublé : cuisinière, frigo, lave-vaisselle, laveuse-sécheuse (très bon état). 2 chambres fermées, dont l'une dans une pièce double. Situé au 2e étage d'un triplex, tranquille. Convient pour couple ou famille. Voisinage sympathique! Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Look moderne.Appartement de 950 pi2, incluant : 2 chambres fermées, suffisamment grandes pour accommoder un lit king. Plafonds de 9', moulures, planchers de bois fraîchement vernis.Accès à une grande cour verdoyante partagée avec le triplex. La cour s'ouvre sur une ruelle, transformée en ruelle verte cet automne. La campagne en ville!
À moins de 5 minutes de marche : épiceries, restaurants, cafés, pharmacie, parcs Lafontaine et Laurier, nettoyeurs, centres de conditionnement physique, métro (Mont-Royal, Laurier) et autobus (97 Mont-Royal, 27 Saint-Joseph, 51 Laurier, 30 St-Denis, 47 Masson).- Cuisine design avec armoires laquées pleine hauteur et comptoir de granit noir. Pièce centrale, pouvant servir de salle à manger ou de salon avec un mur de brique, tout comme dans la salle de bain rénovée.- Stationnement, un grand balcon, un cabanon, un support à vélos.

Title: Grand 4 1/2 au coeur de Griffintown! Semi-meublé. Stationnement inclus
Description:
Une localisation excellente au cœur du vibrant Griffintown à seulement quelques pas de Notre-Dame Ouest sur la rue tranquille de Lusignan. 
Idéal pour jeunes professionnels et/ou un couple. 

L'appartement est très bien entretenu, grand (près de 800 m2), propre et a deux chambres à coucher ainsi qu'un espace à concept ouvert pour la cuisine, salle à manger et salon. Il y a un comptoir à déjeuner, de l'espace pour une salle à manger ainsi qu'un grand salon, le tout très lumineux avec beaucoup de fenêtres et vue sur le centre-ville ainsi que Notre-Dame Ouest. 

Les deux grandes chambres à coucher ont chacune un grand garde-robe ainsi qu'une vue sur une Ruelle Verte à l'arrière du bâtiment qui offre un agréable espace extérieur.

Grande salle de bain avec douche et bain.

Salle de lavage incluant laveuse et sécheuse dans l'appartement.

L'appartement est dans un petit bâtiment avec 6 unités au 3e étage.

Près de tous les services publics à pied (Walkscore de 93). A seulement quelques pas des cafés, restaurant, magasins, bars et épiceries sur Notre-Dame Ouest. 5 minute à pied du métro Lucien-L'Allier et 10 minute du centre-ville. Tout près du Canal Lachine de Griffintown.

Garage intérieur inclus dans la location!

Autres détails:
Parquet dans tous l'appartement avec plancher de céramique dans la cuisine et salle de bain.
Peinture récente
Balcon Juliette dans le salon
Semi-meublé (Réfrigérateur, cuisinière, lave-vaisselle, laveuse, sécheuse, luminaires et stores)
Pas de chien permis (règles de l'immeuble)
Chauffage et électricité payé par le locateur

Les occupants actuels sont intéressés à vendre leur mobilier, donc un appartement tout meuble pourrait être négocié (voir les photos).

Disponible le 1 novembre

Visite: 17h30 Samedi le 30 Septembre. Repondre pour confirmer.

Title: FREE MONTH ! Westmount Adj. renovated, boutique bldg,
Description:
ADJACENT WESTMOUNT -- Sherbrooke and Vendome - Top Floor
Renovated, very sunny and bright large 5 ½ room apartment.
The kitchen is stunning! You have gorgeous south-west views from the kitchen living and dining room, including views of the Mount-Royal Tennis Club right behind the building.

The kitchen is a few years old with:
- Fridge, stove, dishwasher and washer/dryer combo included
- All the hardwood floors have been recently sanded & varnished
- The ceilings and walls have been plastered & painted with gorgeous decorator colors

The apartment has two large bedrooms. The bathroom has been extensively and tastefully renovated with large soaker tub and heated suana. Beautifully restored oak woodwork and moldings. High ceilings with new modern lighting installed. Recessed lighting fixtures in the kitchen, bathroom and hallway.

The building has that "Old World" charm but is updated with most modern conveniences. Very quiet building with only 5 apartments - Intercom - marble lobby

To arrange a visit during the week please call Brian at 
 
. Thanks for your interest.

ADJACENT WESTMOUNT - Sherbrooke et Vendome - Dernier étage
Appartement rénové, très ensoleillé et lumineux de 5 ½ pièces.
La cuisine est superbe! Vous avez des vues magnifiques du sud-ouest depuis la salle à manger et la cuisine, y compris des vues sur le club de tennis Mount-Royal juste derrière le bâtiment.

La cuisine a quelques années avec:
- Réfrigérateur, cuisinière, lave-vaisselle et lave-linge inclus
- Tous les planchers de bois franc ont été récemment sablés et vernis
- Les plafonds et les murs ont été plâtrés et peints avec de magnifiques couleurs décoratrices

L'appartement dispose de deux grandes chambres. La salle de bain a été rénovée avec beaucoup de soin avec une grande baignoire et une suana chauffée. Murs et châssis en chêne magnifiquement restaurés. Plafonds hauts avec de nouveaux éclairage modernes installés. Éclairage encastré dans la cuisine, la salle de bains et le couloir.

Le bâtiment a ce charme du "Vieux Monde" mais est mis à jour avec la plupart des commodités modernes. Immeuble très calme avec seulement 5 appartements - Interphone - entrée en marbre

Pour organiser une visite pendant la semaine, appelez Brian au 
 
. Merci de votre intérêt.

Title: High-End 3 BDR in CSL
Description:
Unfurnished 5 1/2 next door to Cavendish Mall, at the heart of Cote-St-Luc with easy access to everything one needs. In the building, we have an indoor pool, underground parking, a fitness centre and more. Plus, heating, hot water, air conditioning and underground parking are all included in the rent, meaning residents just pay a negligible bill for electricity.

Beautiful ceramic flooring, designed with the modern world in mind: bathrooms fabulously furnished, kitchen all equipped with stainless steel appliances, including stove, dishwasher and refrigerator. Residents will find stacked washers and dryers tucked away in a closet and the apartment has individual temperature controls. 

Great for young families, aspiring professionals and autonomous seniors looking to downsize on space, but live a convenient life near so many activities and so much shopping.

The building with commercial on the ground floor is next door to the city's public library. That means residents will have easy access to all that the shopping centre has to offer, including a CLSC, supermarket, food court, yoga studio, cinema, gym and more. The library is a nest of activities with workshops, performances, talks, movies, books, plays and art. 

This building has a Shabbat elevator, 24-hour security and all the modern amenities you need. Move into a modern, full-service apartment today as this apartment has everything you need both inside and out.

.

Title: Grand 4 1/2 au coeur de Griffintown! Semi-meublé. Stationnement inclus
Description:
Une localisation excellente au cœur du vibrant Griffintown à seulement quelques pas de Notre-Dame Ouest sur la rue tranquille de Lusignan.
Idéal pour jeunes professionnels et/ou un couple.

L'appartement est très bien entretenu, grand (près de 800 m2), propre et a deux chambres à coucher ainsi qu'un espace à concept ouvert pour la cuisine, salle à manger et salon. Il y a un comptoir à déjeuner, de l'espace pour une salle à manger ainsi qu'un grand salon, le tout très lumineux avec beaucoup de fenêtres et vue sur le centre-ville ainsi que Notre-Dame Ouest.

Les deux grandes chambres à coucher ont chacune un grand garde-robe ainsi qu'une vue sur une Ruelle Verte à l'arrière du bâtiment qui offre un agréable espace extérieur.

Grande salle de bain avec douche et bain.

Salle de lavage incluant laveuse et sécheuse dans l'appartement.

L'appartement est dans un petit bâtiment avec 6 unités au 3e étage.

Près de tous les services publics à pied (Walkscore de 93). A seulement quelques pas des cafés, restaurant, magasins, bars et épiceries sur Notre-Dame Ouest. 5 minute à pied du métro Lucien-L'Allier et 10 minute du centre-ville. Tout près du Canal Lachine de Griffintown.

Garage intérieur inclus dans la location!

Autres détails:
Parquet dans tous l'appartement avec plancher de céramique dans la cuisine et salle de bain.
Peinture récente
Balcon Juliette dans le salon
Semi-meublé (Réfrigérateur, cuisinière, lave-vaisselle, laveuse, sécheuse, luminaires et stores)
Pas de chien permis (règles de l'immeuble)
Chauffage et électricité payé par le locateur

Les occupants actuels sont intéressés à vendre leur mobilier, donc un appartement tout meuble pourrait être négocié (voir les photos).

Disponible le 29 Oct (ou le 1 Nov)

Title: 1er Novembre - Cession de bail - grand 4 1/2 Cachet- Chauffé- Plateau
Description:
**Disponible 1er novembre ! ***

Très grand 4 1/2 avec énorme terrasse situé sur St-Joseph entre Brébeuf et Chambord.

L'appartement a une chambre fermée avec fenêtre et garde-robe. (possibilité de 2 CAC en fermant les portes de la salle à manger)
La salle à manger s'ouvre sur un grand salon lumineux. Ce dernier est muni d'un petit balcon.
La cuisine est adjacente à une grande terrasse privée! L'appartement reste frais en été et l'hiver, le système de chauffage à eau procure un confort inégalé.

À proximité, on retrouve le métro Laurier (7 minutes de marche), le parc Laurier (moins d'une minute de marche!) ainsi que l'ensemble des commodités de l'Avenue Laurier (Épicerie, SAQ, etc.) et de l'avenue Mont-Royal.

Le loyer est de 1200$ avec chauffage jusqu'en juin 2017. Il est possible de renouveler par la suite. L'appartement vient avec Four, Réfrigérateur, laveuse et sécheuse.

Bref, il s'agit d'un appartement parfait pour un couple ou une personne seule!

Références et enquête de crédit exigées.

Contacter Guillaume! Merci!

Title: FREE MONTH ! Westmount Adj. renovated, boutique bldg, bright, views
Description:
ADJACENT WESTMOUNT -- Sherbrooke and Vendome - Top Floor
Renovated, very sunny and bright large 5 ½ room apartment.
The kitchen is stunning! You have gorgeous south-west views from the kitchen living and dining room, including views of the Mount-Royal Tennis Club right behind the building.

The kitchen is a few years old with:
- Fridge, stove, dishwasher and washer/dryer combo included
- All the hardwood floors have been recently sanded & varnished
- The ceilings and walls have been plastered & painted with gorgeous decorator colors

The apartment has two large bedrooms. The bathroom has been extensively and tastefully renovated with large soaker tub and heated suana. Beautifully restored oak woodwork and moldings. High ceilings with new modern lighting installed. Recessed lighting fixtures in the kitchen, bathroom and hallway.

The building has that "Old World" charm but is updated with most modern conveniences. Very quiet building with only 5 apartments - Intercom - marble lobby

To arrange a visit during the week please call Brian at 
 
. Thanks for your interest.

ADJACENT WESTMOUNT - Sherbrooke et Vendome - Dernier étage
Appartement rénové, très ensoleillé et lumineux de 5 ½ pièces.
La cuisine est superbe! Vous avez des vues magnifiques du sud-ouest depuis la salle à manger et la cuisine, y compris des vues sur le club de tennis Mount-Royal juste derrière le bâtiment.

La cuisine a quelques années avec:
- Réfrigérateur, cuisinière, lave-vaisselle et lave-linge inclus
- Tous les planchers de bois franc ont été récemment sablés et vernis
- Les plafonds et les murs ont été plâtrés et peints avec de magnifiques couleurs décoratrices

L'appartement dispose de deux grandes chambres. La salle de bain a été rénovée avec beaucoup de soin avec une grande baignoire et une suana chauffée. Murs et châssis en chêne magnifiquement restaurés. Plafonds hauts avec de nouveaux éclairage modernes installés. Éclairage encastré dans la cuisine, la salle de bains et le couloir.

Le bâtiment a ce charme du "Vieux Monde" mais est mis à jour avec la plupart des commodités modernes. Immeuble très calme avec seulement 5 appartements - Interphone - entrée en marbre

Pour organiser une visite pendant la semaine, appelez Brian au 
 
. Merci de votre intérêt.

Title: Maison de ville avec 3 chambres, Greenfield Park, Rive-Sud
Description:
Les Terrasses Riopel-Campbell est un complexe locatif de maisons de ville situé à Greenfield Park sur la Rive-Sud offrant des maisons de ville entièrement rénovées non-meublées avec 2,3 ou 4 chambres fermées et un sous-sol.  Idéal pour les familles, les cours sont clôturées et le complexe est dans un quartier très tranquille.
Situé près de l'intersection Lawrence et Campbell, le complexe est à seulement 5 minutes des ponts Champlain, Victoria, et Jacques-Cartier en voiture.  À quelques pas des lignes d'autobus 15 et 115, il est près de tous les services nécessaires: épiceries, pharmacies, banque, écoles, parc, l'Hôpital Charles-Lemoyne, Les Galeries Taschereau, etc.

 





 








S'il vous plaît appelez ou textez au: 
http://clauval.ca/





-----

The Terrasses Riopel-Campbell is a rental townhouse complex located in Greenfield Park on the South Shore offering 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms unfurnished fully renovated townhouses with basement. Ideal for families, there's a fenced-in backyard and is in a very quiet neighborhood.
Located near the intersection of Lawrence and Campbell, it's only 5 minutes away by car from the Champlain, Victoria and Jacques-Cartier bridges.   A few steps from the bus routes 15 and 115, it's close to all the services one needs: groceries, pharmacies, bank, schools, park, Charles-Lemoyne Hospital, Les Galeries Taschereau, etc .



        

 

 




 
      


Please call or text: 
http://clauval.ca/

Title: Spacious and cool two bedroom apartment for rent
Description:
DESCRIPTION
 
A cozy house only 10 minutes from downtown Montreal. Duplex for rent, 5 1/2 on the second floor. Very strategic location. It takes only 15 ... 20 minutes to the Montreal center by bus or 10 minutes by car. And only 10 minutes from Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport. 

Nearby: arena, public swimming pool, library, park, cycle path, Lachine canal, restaurants. Close access to bus service and 10 minute walk to the train. Quick access to highway 20 , 13 and 15. I love to run. Usually I run along the Lachine Canal to the center of Montreal ( 10 kilometers) or to the Park Rene Levesque or even to Dorval enjoying the magnificent beauty of the nature. We also often go for a walk along the canal de Lachine all the family to the center of Montreal. We made all (or almost all) to make you feel at home...

House rules
We respect the tranquility of our neighbors. We hope that you also will respect them. We do not welcome parties and noise. We welcome travelers who came to see our wonderful city. We are open to dialogue. And we will be glad if you will feel like at home. 

We can provide free parking for one car (for the second car you will have to pay $ 10 a day or you can park on the street in font of the house). Cleaning fee added to final price.
